story:
Who Am I and Why Am I Crowdfunding?

My name is Adam W. Warner and I've been building businesses powered by WordPress and writing about it since 2005. If you're not familiar with WordPress, it's the Open Source web publishing platform that now powers over 23% of sites on the Internet.

I'm an active member of the WordPress community and have a passion for teaching and showing others how to utilize WordPress to achieve their independent business goals.

You may have seen me speaking at WordCamps, promoting companies I believe in, or offering advice in various WordPress-focused Facebook groups and on the WordPress.org forums.

You can learn more about my outlook on life in general here.


WordCamp Miami Presentation

WordCamp Orlando Helping to Promote a WordPress Service Provider 

How Funding This Campaign Will Help You and Others Around the World

Whether you're already a WordPress expert, or brand new to WordPress, this project will help you to build, grow, and enhance your WordPress-powered business.

There are already some great sources for learning WordPress including WordPress Lessons, WPBeginner, WP Tavern, Post Status, Pippin's Plugins, BobWP, Chris Lema, WP Mayor, WP101, and many others.

But basic usage, industry news, and develepor tutorials are not the focus of this site.

How WP Pro Business is Different

Other sites focus more on how to use the software itself, WordPress news, or advanced coding for those developing themes or plugins and not how to utilize WordPress to build and market your offline or online business.

WP Pro Business will focus exclusively on teaching people just like you how to enhance and market their businesses utilizing various combinations of WordPress plugins and related services.


WordPress and Business Beginners

WP Pro Business will be a free resource to educate and guide business owners to the plugins, services and marketing methods with proven results in order to fast track their site builds and revenue growth.

Freelance Designers and Developers

Time is of the essence when you're a freelancer and searching for the right solution to implement in your WordPress projects.

Breaking from your project to research answers is unpaid time and often takes some trial and error to ensure you have the right tool (or plugin) to accomplish what your client needs.

Let me do the testing for you by way of video and written tutorials that are concise, to the point, and not filled with fluff. I'll save you time in finding the right plugin and other tools so you can take on more clients. 

Agencies

Your agency team does more than custom site development and you should have a free resource for saving time. You should also have a trusted source that you can point clients to, for those who want to learn more about growing the business you helped them to create.

Each tutorial will show the specific benefit to their business. Visitors who don't want to (or don't know how) to implement the content of the tutorial will be encouraged to request it from their preferred agency contact.

See What Others Have to Say

Adam is not just incredibly generous with sharing his experience growing WordPress businesses, but he's great at it. 
When he writes and speaks, he makes it clear how you can apply what he's learned to your own business. 
I look forward to reading more of what he has to offer through a re-booted WP Pro Business.
Josh Pollock - CalderaWP
Adam is a fountain of WordPress and small business knowledge. He's talked me through more than a few challenges. 
If you can get 30 minutes of his time, you won't be disappointed.
Ben Fox - SIDEKICK.pro

Before I met with Adam I tried building my business website with WordPress on my own. In such an overloaded and confusing world of information, Adam simplified the process of building a website focused on getting customers through my door. 

His lessons were clear, concise and easy to understand for someone who wanted a business website that not only focuses today's immediate requirements but also with an eye toward the future.  

Nicole Johnson - Above the Neck Salon

Adam's business insights and generosity make him a rare and unique breed in the WordPress world. 
Much of what I do on a day to day basis since is directly influenced by things I learned from Adam. 
Some folks I take with a grain of salt -- Adam's advice I take with a steak and a beer. It's that good.
Matt Cromwell - WordPress Developer and Entrepreneur
I’d never used EDD before this course, but have some experience with other eCommerce plugins. The lessons were easy to follow and covered required settings and usage details to configure the plugin for built-in test and PayPal Standard gateways. 
For many sites, that’s all that’s needed, particularly with the reporting features available out of the box. I can see using this plugin for myself and for authors who don’t need a full-blown eCommerce solution. 
Nice course with just the right amount of detail to complete quickly and put to use!
Satisfied EasyDigitalDownloads Plugin Video Course Participant

Example Tutorials

Written

HTML Basics for Better SEO and Readability in WordPress
Lead Generation Using Twitter Cards
A Two Step Email Marketing Method for Telling Your Customers They're Special

Video

Two Free WordPress Themes for Photographers
How to Create Advanced Contact Forms in WordPress
How to Add Review Google Rich Snippets in WordPress and Why You Should
How to Create WordPress Image Galleries and Apply the FooBox Lightbox

Why This Site Needs a Reboot

Publishing high quality and regularly updated content for any website is a full time job. 

Three years ago I was trying to grow and scale this site into a self-supporting business while still working full time as a Web Development and Internet Marketing Manager for a large corporation, but that process came with an inherent weak point: there are only 24 hours in a day.

I made the choice to focus on my corporate day job and this site quickly suffered as I no longer had the time to create the kind of tutorial content it deserved.

I loved this position as it allowed me to work with the same software I love, every day.

Fast Forward Four Years

This company relocated its local office and I had the option to pursue the same career in their other locations (a different State or a different Country).

But because our first son was due to be born in less than a month, I chose to stay in my location and with the help of our savings, cashing out my 401k, and family, started a premium WordPress plugin business with a partner that has maintained a solid market share for the past three years.

I was able to build that company into a strong self-sustaining digital business and have learned much along the way, and it's still growing today.

But now it's time to get back to my true passion: Teaching and creating content that people can utilize immediately to create, grow, and scale their own independent businesses powered by WordPress. Just like I've done.

Our First Son Resting His Head on my WordPress Logo Tattoo


What This Project Needs & Where It Goes

My goal is to raise $79,000. Here's a planned breakdown of how those funds will be utilized in the first year.

30 - 45 Days After Campaign Ends:

  • Secure FAST WordPress Managed Hosting
  • Data Migration and Merging of wpmodder and wpprobusiness Content
  • Reorganization of Website Structure and Content
  • A Custom Developed Theme for Easier Tutorial Display and Navigation
  • 8 Hours of My Time Daily to Create Video and Written Tutorials
45 - 90 Days After Campaign Ends:
  • Minimum 5 Tutorials Weekly (Video and Written)
  • Exclusive Discounts Area for Premium WordPress Products/Service Partners
  • Begin Creation of Free eBook Library
90 - 135 Days After Campaign Ends:
  • Continue 5 Tutorial Minimum (and strive to increase)
  • Continue Building Product/Service Discount Area
  • Publish Free eBook Library
  • Begin Creation/Planning of Membership Area
  • Hire 1 Full Time Employee
135 - 180 Days After Campaign Ends:
  • Increase Tutorial Minimum to 7
  • Continue Growing Product/Service Discount Area
  • Release Membership Area to Begin Revenue Building (will include live webinars via Google Hangouts and Live Q&A Sessions)
  • Offer Sponsorships to Begin Revenue Building
  • Add Monetization to YouTube Channel
180 - 365
  • Continue 7 Tutorial Minimum
  • Continue Growing Product/Service Discount Area
  • Broadcast Members-Only Webinars and Live Q&A Sessions (starting monthly with the goal of weekly broadcasts)
  • Rinse, Wash, Repeat to build a sustainable resource site for free WordPress plugin usage and business and marketing tutorials

You Can Make a Difference Right Now

By funding the reboot and continuation of this site you will be directly impacting the lives of countless others who find, consume, and benefit from my tutorials.

I am not the first, nor will I be the last to create WordPress-specific tutorial sites, but I believe I have something that other sites don't:

A true passion for helping others achieve their goal of creating an independent and self-sustaining business powered by WordPress.

Whether you utilize WordPress as a simple brochure type site for your offline business or are actively creating and selling digital products, I have the experience and passion to help you navigate through the tens of thousands of free and premium products and services that will impact your business.

I love learning and experimenting and showing you the results in order to save you time and frustration.

Risks & Challenges

No project comes without hurdles, whether anticipated or unseen. The one challenge that has plagued me in the past few years has been those pesky and limited 24 hours.

I've done quite a bit of soul searching, self-improvement and planning to ensure that the schedule I've outlined above is attainable and to be frank, this campaign plays a critical role in helping me stick to my planned schedule.

The funding from this campaign will allow me to focus 100% on growing this site and its content to where I've always envisioned it could be. The "trick" was always finding a way to work on it full time while still supporting myself and my family.

Your contribution will directly impact the lives and futures of countless others who are learning as I did years ago about what's possible with the WordPress software.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not in a position to help fund this campaign but you still believe that what I'm trying to do will make a difference, there is still one super simple way to lend a hand.

  • Copy the url to this site and include it in your blog posts.
  • Even easier, just use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word! (Pro Tip: use hashtag #wppoweredbusiness)
Whether you decide to contribute and/or share this campaign, you can stay updated with the progress by subscribing by email here.

Thank you so much for taking a look and considering funding this campaign. Your support, whether through funding or sharing means everything to me.

Sincerely,

Adam W. Warner

His lessons were clear, concise and easy to understand for someone who wanted a business website that not only focuses today's immediate requirements but also with an eye toward the future.  
Nicole Johnson - Above the Neck Salon


Adam's business insights and generosity make him a rare and unique breed in the WordPress world. 
Much of what I do on a day to day basis since is directly influenced by things I learned from Adam. 
Some folks I take with a grain of salt -- Adam's advice I take with a steak and a beer. It's that good.

Matt Cromwell - WordPress Developer and Entrepreneur


I’d never used EDD before this course, but have some experience with other eCommerce plugins. The lessons were easy to follow and covered required settings and usage details to configure the plugin for built-in test and PayPal Standard gateways. 
For many sites, that’s all that’s needed, particularly with the reporting features available out of the box. I can see using this plugin for myself and for authors who don’t need a full-blown eCommerce solution. 
Nice course with just the right amount of detail to complete quickly and put to use!

Satisfied EasyDigitalDownloads Plugin Video Course Participant

Example Tutorials
Written
HTML Basics for Better SEO and Readability in WordPress

Lead Generation Using Twitter Cards

A Two Step Email Marketing Method for Telling Your Customers They're Special
Video
Two Free WordPress Themes for Photographers
How to Create Advanced Contact Forms in WordPress
How to Add Review Google Rich Snippets in WordPress and Why You Should
How to Create WordPress Image Galleries and Apply the FooBox Lightbox
Why This Site Needs a Reboot
Publishing high quality and regularly updated content for any website is a full time job. 

Three years ago I was trying to grow and scale this site into a self-supporting business while still working full time as a Web Development and Internet Marketing Manager for a large corporation, but that process came with an inherent weak point: there are only 24 hours in a day.

I made the choice to focus on my corporate day job and this site quickly suffered as I no longer had the time to create the kind of tutorial content it deserved.

I loved this position as it allowed me to work with the same software I love, every day.

Fast Forward Four Years
This company relocated its local office and I had the option to pursue the same career in their other locations (a different State or a different Country).

But because our first son was due to be born in less than a month, I chose to stay in my location and with the help of our savings, cashing out my 401k, and family, started a premium WordPress plugin business with a partner that has maintained a solid market share for the past three years.

I was able to build that company into a strong self-sustaining digital business and have learned much along the way, and it's still growing today.

But now it's time to get back to my true passion: Teaching and creating content that people can utilize immediately to create, grow, and scale their own independent businesses powered by WordPress. Just like I've done.



Our First Son Resting His Head on my WordPress Logo Tattoo
   
What This Project Needs & Where It Goes
My goal is to raise $79,000. Here's a planned breakdown of how those funds will be utilized in the first year.

30 - 45 Days After Campaign Ends:


Secure FAST WordPress Managed Hosting
Data Migration and Merging of wpmodder and wpprobusiness Content
Reorganization of Website Structure and Content
A Custom Developed Theme for Easier Tutorial Display and Navigation
8 Hours of My Time Daily to Create Video and Written Tutorials

45 - 90 Days After Campaign Ends:


Minimum 5 Tutorials Weekly (Video and Written)
Exclusive Discounts Area for Premium WordPress Products/Service Partners
Begin Creation of Free eBook Library

90 - 135 Days After Campaign Ends:


Continue 5 Tutorial Minimum (and strive to increase)
Continue Building Product/Service Discount Area
Publish Free eBook Library
Begin Creation/Planning of Membership Area
Hire 1 Full Time Employee
135 - 180 Days After Campaign Ends:


Increase Tutorial Minimum to 7
Continue Growing Product/Service Discount Area
Release Membership Area to Begin Revenue Building (will include live webinars via Google Hangouts and Live Q&A Sessions)
Offer Sponsorships to Begin Revenue Building
Add Monetization to YouTube Channel

180 - 365


Continue 7 Tutorial Minimum
Continue Growing Product/Service Discount Area
Broadcast Members-Only Webinars and Live Q&A Sessions (starting monthly with the goal of weekly broadcasts)
Rinse, Wash, Repeat to build a sustainable resource site for free WordPress plugin usage and business and marketing tutorials

    You Can Make a Difference Right Now
By funding the reboot and continuation of this site you will be directly impacting the lives of countless others who find, consume, and benefit from my tutorials.

I am not the first, nor will I be the last to create WordPress-specific tutorial sites, but I believe I have something that other sites don't:

A true passion for helping others achieve their goal of creating an independent and self-sustaining business powered by WordPress.

Whether you utilize WordPress as a simple brochure type site for your offline business or are actively creating and selling digital products, I have the experience and passion to help you navigate through the tens of thousands of free and premium products and services that will impact your business.

I love learning and experimenting and showing you the results in order to save you time and frustration.
    Risks & Challenges
No project comes without hurdles, whether anticipated or unseen. The one challenge that has plagued me in the past few years has been those pesky and limited 24 hours.

I've done quite a bit of soul searching, self-improvement and planning to ensure that the schedule I've outlined above is attainable and to be frank, this campaign plays a critical role in helping me stick to my planned schedule.

The funding from this campaign will allow me to focus 100% on growing this site and its content to where I've always envisioned it could be. The "trick" was always finding a way to work on it full time while still supporting myself and my family.

Your contribution will directly impact the lives and futures of countless others who are learning as I did years ago about what's possible with the WordPress software.
    Other Ways You Can Help If you're not in a position to help fund this campaign but you still believe that what I'm trying to do will make a difference, there is still one super simple way to lend a hand.  Copy the url to this site and include it in your blog posts. Even easier, just use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word! (Pro Tip: use hashtag #wppoweredbusiness) 
Whether you decide to contribute and/or share this campaign, you can stay updated with the progress by subscribing by email here.  Thank you so much for taking a look and considering funding this campaign. Your support, whether through funding or sharing means everything to me.Sincerely,Adam W. Warner

story:
Short Summary

In the military, we come together from all walks of life to form a band of brothers to defend freedom; to proudly serve our families, our branch of service, and ultimately our country and all Americans.  This type of drive and motivation comes from within. It is a sort of 'calling.’

Hello, my name is John White. I am the CEO and an owner of XPC Force Protection. XPC Force Protection, or “XPC” for short, is a small business based in New Braunfels, Texas, which is located between San Antonio and Austin.

Contributions we receive will directly provide much needed benefits to veterans. Too often, veterans find unnecessary obstacles when they decide to leave active duty. XPC wants to help these heroes with a much improved transition into the civilian world. Your contributions will aid in providing access to employment and training for these highly skilled and intelligent people. They have made sacrifices for this country. Now, XPC plans to give back to them.

Now that each of us have completed our tours of duty, we still crave the higher calling of serving others. We want to give back to our local communities, our country, and even continue serving American interests overseas.

We want to provide a familiar environment for our veterans. Transitioning from military service to a civilian lifestyle can sometimes be difficult. Our country has come a long way since our forefathers have returned home from the battlefield and face uncertainty. However, there is still work to be done.

What We Need & What You Get

First, we need meet the financial burden that comes with starting a new business.

Second, we need to build a marketing campaign that can reach global business leaders that may be able to utilize our services.

Third, we need work. We are highly trained individuals education and experienced by Uncle Sam. We have a sense of achievement and dedication that rivals none. However, our message and services need to reach those individuals in positions to hiring us. We can hold concealed handgun license (CHL) classes locally or we can provide asset security for large conglomerates (oil pipelines, electrical substations, sea-going shipping container vessels, etc.). We can greatly reduce the risk of piracy on the high seas or provide a vigilant watch over your production compound. We are highly trained and professional veterans ready to work.

The Impact

Nearly all of our current employees are combat veterans from the Marine Corps, Navy, Army, Air Force, and some of us have even retired. Our internal programs will provide these veterans with necessary skills to return to, and maintain, a productive and sustained lifestyle outside of the military. This is where we need your help. All donations raised will help us provide meaningful employment and transition resources to those who have returned home to face uncertainty. We will provide meaningful training, both in the classroom, as well as on-the-job training, even counseling services and support teams. We want to provide meaningful employment for as many veterans as possible. Providing sustainable employment means providing meaningful jobs. As many of you already know, one challenge of providing meaningful jobs requires a significant budget to advertise our services.

Your contributions will directly help to put veterans to work in the short-term, and help them plan for new careers in the long-term.

XPC has coined the phrase: “Being a victim is only a state of mind.” This means you are only a victim until you repel that fear of being a victim. We want all of our clients to feel safe and secure whether it’s at work, at home, or at play. We have a list of consultation services we offer as well as various training services. Our veterans have years of expertise within their respective job fields and look forward to giving back to the community we once protected while in uniform. We want to continue to protect our communities not that we are out of our uniforms. We have partnered with other organizations to offer even greater amenities to our clients.

Risks & Challenges

We know there are risks along the way. We also know that we will leave no one behind. Our commitment to service, to each other, and to you will continue to inspire us and inspire XPC. To everyone still deployed, keep your head down and come home safe. We will be here for you. For everyone else, come on this journey with us. We would love to have you.

We need funds to begin the process of helping veterans, and our company, to grow. In the long run, our company will provide more jobs, both domestically as well as globally, to more veterans.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to be a part of our journey, please consider donating. No amount is too small or too large. If you cannot donate, please consider helping us spread the word about our committed and dedication veterans who comprise our company. You can help by visiting our social media sites (listed below) and getting your friends and family to do the same. Perhaps you could mention us at work or on your social media networks. Any help is greatly appreciated.

Facebook:  www.facebook.com/XPCForceProtection

Twitter:  www.twitter.com/xpc_info

Instagram:  https://instagram.com/xpcforceprotection

Google+:  https://goo.gl/kOzTId

LinkedIn:  https://www.linkedin.com/company/xpc-force-protection

Thank you all so much!

XPC Force Protection

www.xpcforceprotection.com

story:
What is Tre Truck?

Tre Truck is the world's first mobile skate shop.  Founded in 2011, we have spent the last 5 years servicing the New York City skate community. Whether it's gear, snacks, or just a helping hand, we are there when skaters need us.  What makes us different from other skate-shops is that Tre Truck isn't bound by any single location.  We move from park to park and spot to spot, wherever people are shredding.  This means that we are right there when things go wrong to fix your setup. Whether its a popped bearing or a broken board we are there to help!  We also try to give back to the community by putting on events and competitions.

We also want to help bring the style of New York street skating around the world.  Like a skateboard Johnny Appleseed, planting little Big Apples from coast to coast.

Check out these videos to see what a day cruising with the Tre Truck is like!



You can also have a look at this piece the Berrics produced about the Tre Truck.

Why We Need Your Help 

Tre Truck is getting ready to expand its operations.

We are planning on expanding our services in the following ways:

  • Hiring 2 full time employees to keep Tre Truck running 7 days a week.
  • Hosting 5 events and competitions for the local skate community.
  • Traveling to 3 larger skate events nationwide.
  • Working with New York City Department of Parks and Recreation to offer skate lessons for various skill levels.
  • Expanding our presence with a Tre Truck in California
We also need capital to keep the Tre Truck going day-to-day.  These obligations include:

  • Truck maintenance
  • Parking/Gas
  • Permits and licenses
  • Inventory management

The Impact

Skate shops have always been at the core of the skateboarding community.  Since the days of clay wheels, kids have gone to their local skate shop not only to buy gear, but to find mentorship from more experienced skaters.  The Tre Truck provides that same skate shop atmosphere right by the skatepark.  This means that skaters don't have to go as far to meet a supportive network of people that will help them learn, grow, and have fun.

Skate shops are also a hub of creativity.  Their role as a place for skaters to come together means that people are always bouncing ideas and challenging one another to grow their skills.  The Tre Truck will help continue this tradition and strengthen it by bringing the shop and the street closer together.  We are also there to help settle conflicts and provide a safe space and friendly atmosphere.

Risks & Challenges

Beyond the normal risks of a brick and mortar retail business. There are two primary obstacles that come with running a mobile skate shop.  These include:

  • Unexpected truck breakdowns
  • Unpredictable weather/Seasonal Business
While breakdowns are inevitable, part of our plan is to expand our presence to California, so that we can keep active year-round.  Our first step in expanding will be taking the Tre Truck on a cross-country tour to California with our friends, The Gnarmads.  We will make many stops on our way and finally settle on the west coast for the winter.  Once there, we will begin working the groundwork for a TreTruck in California.  For more details, check out this map of our tour:


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, it doesn't mean you can't help us out!

Please download and share this video on instagram and vine!

Please tell all your friends! Please shred and when people ask you how you got so good, tell them it was the Tre Truck!

Special Thanks

We want to thank our friends Shut Skateboards, NY Skateboarding, The Gnarmads, Bogdan and Matt, Nolan Lee, POW Skateboards, Billy Rohan, The Berrics, and all the people who have shown us support so far. We could not have gotten this far without your help!

story: Our goal is to raise (''$1,000,000.00''), together, I do believe that this can be accomplished.   If only 1,000,000 people were to donate $1.00 each, we will reach our first goal.  Once our first goal is completed, we will be on our way towards success.  We are going to start a legal non-profit 501(c)(3) business, of which is a federal number assigned to non-profit organizations.  Initially, I am hoping to establish at least 5-10 successful minority owned businesses, that will eventually attract more .  Professional instructors will be employed to train, and   provide guidance throughout the process.  We will require each recipient to complete business classes in order to develop, and achieve a well prepared business plan ("free of charge").  Upon completion, there will be a written agreement that each individual business will be required to sign to pay back the total funds distributed among them in order for the National Minority Business Fund to benefit future additional businesses for many years to come.  We are asking for support from our friends, family, community, and other diversified professional businesses to contribute to our campaign cause.  Service veteran, Mr. Roderick L. Presley, founder of The National Minority Business Fund, whom was honorably discharged from The United States Air Force, and was assigned to The 308th. Tactical Air Command Squadron as an Aircrew Life Support Specialist, based in Homestead, Fl.  U.S.A.F..  He has a solid belief, ("that your attitude determines your altitude")!  Thank you for your interest, time, and consideration in joining our professional team.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The National Minority Business Fund                                                                                            Mr. Roderick L. Presley,  C.E.O./founder

story:
• chaudronnier soudeur de formation , électricien et plombier chauffagiste en tant  que artisan  et changement radical de profession.

    •   CLAUDE 53 ans auto-entrepreneur depuis 12 mois.

        J'ai créé une petite PME sur la fabrication de remorques vélo sur mesure. Je peux vous proposer des remorques teardrop ou micro-caravane.

    •   Voici un peu le type de produit que sera cette remorque teardrop , Une remorque pour le camping , les loisirs, la pêche ,la chasse,les sorties du week-end

    • C'est un produit totalement made in MAYENNE, conception et fabrication artisanales ,fabriquer avec du bois ou résine polyester toutes équipé cuisine( four micro onde ,évier ,cafetière,frigo , réserve d'eau ,WC pour les plus grandes ,avec douche

        - Elle durera très longtemps

        - Elles seront modulables en dimensions pour les adapter à vos  remorques, ou prête sur châssis

        Marché en pleine expansion. Notre objectif est d'en mettre en location, et en vente


  •   La collecte servira à 3 choses :

    •   - La première c'est la fabrication de deux modèles de teardrop standard une et deux places  Pour répondre aux attentes des pécheurs et campeurs.  Et financer le développement et la normalisation pour répondre aux règlements en vigueur. coût 3000 euros.

    •   - La deuxième chose serait de financer l'achat d'une scie à ruban ,et d’une presse pour la fabrication des flans ( côtés des teardrops)

        1500 euros

    •   - La troisième, financer le développement de 2 remorques différentes (publicité marketing ).

        1000 euros

  •   250 EUR

        deux tee-shirts , plus deux casquettes avec logo entreprise plus deux entrée de cinéma, plus 10% reversé au crowdfunding ,


      25 EUR

      autocollant de l'entreprise

      un logo autocollant de l'entreprise


      50EUR

      un T-Shirt avec le logo

      un T-Shirt avec le logo de l'entreprise , plus une casquette avec logo

    100EUR

      un t-shirt avec mon logo

      un tee-shirt avec logo entreprise, plus une casquette avec logo et votre nom en participation sur mes flyers ,plus 5% reversé au crowdfunding


      500EUR

      deux tee-schirts avec mon logo

      deux tee-shirts , plus deux casquettes avec logo entreprise logo, plus votre nom en participation sur mes flyers plus 15 % reversé au crowdfunding

      €1,000EUR

      prêt sur un week-end

      deux tee-shirts, plus deux casquettes avec logo entreprise plus plus votre nom en participation sur mes flyers 5 % reversé au crowdfunding ,le prêt d'une teardrop sur un week-end

      €2,500EUR

      prêt sur six jours

      deux tee-schirts , plus deux casquettes avec logo entreprise ,plus 5 % reversé au crowdfunding , , plus le prêt d'une teardrop sur deux week-ends

L'impact

 je pense, que nous sommes actuellement sur un marché porteur du aux loisirs et au développement de celui- ci et tout ce qui l'entoure dans un monde proche où toutes les personnes se mettent à faire du tourisme, allez en famille en courte durée

  le fait qu'ils puissent être en parfaite autonomie avec leurs mode de vie ,leurs concède une parfaite liberté,et aussi de pouvoir sortir le week-end plus librement



Risques et défis

le fait d'avoir réaliser ma première teardrop m'a énormément impliquer,les risques sont je dirai un peu la vie de famille délaissé, un peu financier car sans aides ils faut jonglé avec les fournisseurs,qui dans ce sens m'ont bien aidés, je m'autofinance tous seul en dépit du budget familial dans lequel je coupe un peu, mais je suis à la fin de mon projet, que j'ai commencer  le 09 04 2015 , maintenant je souhaite m'agrandir et peut être employer du personnel

  • j'ai toujours réussi ce que je fait,malgré la conjoncture 
  • si je n'arrive pas à attendre mon objectif financier je continuerai en prenant plus de temps

D'autres façons d'aider

Certaines personnes ne peuvent pas contribuer mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

  • faites tourné autour de vous cela en vaut la peine, même pour des petites contributions, n'oubliez pas de faire suivre la page et de partager Indiegogo

Et le tour est joué.

story:
New campaign: igg.me/at/m3REaiPAQHU



Our Forgotten Farmworkers

Every year, thousands flock to the Coachella Valley for its Music and Arts Festival. Just a short, twelve minute ride southeast of the festival location lies a different Coachella -- one not nearly as glamorous. It's actually quite the opposite: filthy, decaying, and in need of your help.

Shady Lane Mobilehome Park, located in Thermal, is home to about 40 migrant farmworkers and their families. The farmworkers at Shady Lane work long, hard hours at low wages that keep our food prices low. These low wages come at an enormous cost: dangerously poor living conditions.

Extended electricity outages are common, often leaving residents without air conditioning during the Coachella Valley's exceptionally hot summers. One resident fell ill when her home temperature reached 115°. Many families are forced to sleep outside when the heat is unbearable. Young people living at the park often must choose between using the Internet to do homework or staying cool. Running water shuts down for entire days, leaving residents unable to wash hands or take showers. The park's septic system frequently malfunctions, causing waste to overflow during rain season and when residents wash clothing and take baths. Homes are falling apart, letting rain and cockroaches inside. 


Joseph, age 7, suffers from asthma. He uses a nebulizer to alleviate his symptoms, which are exacerbated by the Coachella Valley heat. His bedroom temperature often reaches over 100 degrees, because power outages are common during the summer. During one of Joseph's asthma attacks, the electricity malfunctioned and wiring of his nebulizer shocked him. Donate today to stabilize Joseph's home electricity.


Instead of improving these conditions, the park owner neglected the residents and left the park unpermitted for years. In 2011, the owner took steps toward shutting down the park, which would have left the families at Shady Lane without anywhere to live. Residents do not want to leave; they are a tight-knit community that has lived in the park for generations. As Carina Felix, lifelong resident of the park, put it, "To me, this park means home, family, hope."

UC Irvine School of Law's pro bono Community and Economic Development Clinic (CED), in collaboration with California Rural Legal Assistance (CRLA), is working to prevent the families at Shady Lane from being evicted and to improve their living conditions. CED and CRLA recently negotiated a settlement agreement with the owner that would allow a nonprofit organization to purchase the park at a reduced price. 




The Project


Step 1: Residents take Control of their Park 

To take control of their park, residents incorporated Shady Lane Mobile Home Park, Inc. (SLMP), a registered nonprofit organization. SLMP's board includes residents of the park and will actively seek advice from all residents on decisions. With your help, SLMP will be able to purchase the park and finance the cost of a Conditional Use Permit. 


Step 2: Immediate Repairs to Improve Health 

Once it gains ownership of the park, SLMP intends to repair electricity to give families access to reliable air conditioning. It also hopes to connect water and sewage piping to regional water and sewage lines. This will end sewage overflows and ensure that families have access to reliable running water. These repairs are expected to dramatically improve resident health prospects.


Step 3: Long-Term Projects to Improve Quality of Life
Eventually, SLMP intends to replace worn-down mobile home units with new units to stop leakage and ensure long-term reliability of electricity. SLMP also hopes to construct a community center, with a playground for the kids! The residents are tight-knit, and a community center would give them a central location to celebrate birthdays and other special events together. 


Our First Goal: $225,000 
SLMP's first goal is set at $225,000 to finance the purchase of the park. Once we surpass this goal, SLMP will fundraise for the remainder of the costs. Please contact us if you have any questions.


Provide for Shady Lane 

We ask you to please donate to our fundraising campaign. Your generosity can have a profound impact in improving the health and quality of life of the families of Shady Lane. 100 percent of funds raised will go directly towards purchasing and rehabilitating the park. 

As Robert Solomon, Co-Director of CED, wrote in an LA Times Op-Ed, "We all benefit from our farmworkers' labor. A decent place to live seems little to give in return."



Donate $50, and get this "The Real Coachella" poster! 


Donate $100, and get this "The Real Coachella" tumbler! 


Get Involved

Share our Indiegogo page link on your social media sites (use the hashtag #TheRealCoachella). Write Op-Eds for local newspapers, including the link to our page. Email your friends, family, and organizations explaining why this cause is important to you. Spreading the word about the campaign to as many people as possible will be crucial to improving the conditions at Shady Lane. Follow us on Twitter and Instagram at @realcoachella. Like and invite your friends to like our Facebook page.

story:
Short Summary

I will be trekking to the Himalayas this August to set up solar micro grids in remote almost inaccessible villages at +16000 ft.  

I’m looking for funding of USD 4000/- for this noble cause

These funds are primarily to purchase raw materials - its transport and logistics, includes the villagers' training and some inventory costs.

A note on the village:

The village I would be impacting directly by setting up solar micro grid is Um Loong which is a 13th Century village with 59 inhabitants. This village is at least a few 100 kms away from any signposts of civilization. There is also a Buddhist monastery a few metres away which has never seen light after sunset – we hope that we can change that after our visit in August. The villagers are still using kerosene lamps in the night. They have little or no means of livelihood except lending their horses/ mules for trekking and selling woollen caps to the trekkers. They are completely cut off from civilization.

About the team I will trek with:

I would be a part of the Global Himalayan Expedition (GHE) 2015. 

GHE was set up in 2013, when a few trekkers came across a village en route which had no electricity. They decided to set up a more sustainable solar micro grid together with the help of IEEE.

In 2014 Aug, a village named Sumda Chenmo saw electric light in the night for the first time…

They (the villagers) had the following benefits thereafter:

-  The micro grid completely eliminated usage of 1600 litres of kerosene (amounting to around 4000kgs of CO2) from the entire village

-  It extended the working hours of the villagers by 4hrs/day, where major occupation is brass and copper work and local handicrafts

-  It helped the villagers escape poisonous fumes generated through use of oil lamps used for lighting

-  Increased income generation by making the village a more attractive destination for home stays. Now trekkers passing through the village prefer to stay in the village homes that provide them with light and charging facilities.

-  The grid also supports a DC LED television (TV), specially designed for this project, that brings the community together for special screening of movies based on social issues.

I hope you see that there is value in this project and also shows how a few of us could impact the lives of many others.

About me:

I'm working in the maritime industry. I'm quite an enthusiast for adventure and hoped that this initiative would impact few peoples' lives in a positive way :)

story:
Food is a right, not a privilege.

My name is Noel Regachuelo, i am a freelance visual artist, i do comics illustration, graphic design and children's book illustration, i am also a community grassroots organizer. Greenhouse Infoshop Project is the name of our small but effective autonomous project here in Naga City Philippines, we organize free film screenings, book drive, art workshops, art exhibits and specially "Food not bombs" sharing free meals, clothing's, household items, books etc. for marginalized communities in Naga City.

We started our Food not bombs activity since 2006. Since we organize Food not Bombs every month we need extra resources for cooking and food preparation. We started this campaign in order for us to provide extra kitchen materials like: oven, big pots, utensils, extra tables and chairs for our monthly Food Not Bombs activity. 

Food not bombs advocates that "food is a right, not a privilege", we proudly promote Mutual Aid, Voluntary Cooperation, Direct Action and encourage individuals to practice sharing in any ways.

We are hoping for your positive contribution,                                                                   Please Support Food Not Bombs Naga City!

For Mutual Aid and Direct Action!

story:
Mission Statement

The 2500 block of Alter Street, also known as Mabel Wilson Walk, has provided generations of Central Boys and Girls Club members and their families a place to relax, learn about agriculture through gardening, and a safe haven for the community to engage in activities that they can utilize in their everyday lives.

Overview and Goals

The Central Club for Boys and Girls was founded by Mrs. Mabel Wilson in 1946. Her vision was to create a safe environment for the families of the community to foster physical, moral, and spiritual growth. With the assistance of Mrs. Howard and Mrs. Fain, Mabel Wilson’s vision has given birth to five (5) generations of safe community activities which includes The Boys and Girls Scouts, 4-H Club, The gardening club, an annual harvest fair, and vacation bible school.

Mabel Wilson was a pillar of the community and was hailed as the backbone of the 2500 block of Alter Street. She wore many hats as a teacher, activist, creator, and an innovator to the community. She has spent many years teaching vocational skills to thousands of youth and adults in preparation for the professional world. Those skills include typing, short hand, filing, public speaking, posture, and basic office skills just to name a few. She also taught many youths how to use the first computers and word processors.

Many of these activities were funded from Mabel herself. She made table cloths and aprons and spent many of nights at her sewing machine trying to keep up with orders; cutting and framing glass, picking her flowers and produce from her garden to sell, and art were sold to continue to keep the garden and all of the activities going and thriving. With her growing list of activities and teaches she used her life savings to purchase the house across the street from her so that the community could have a place that the community could call their own, which is now called the Scouts Community Center. After Mrs. Wilson’s passing in 2010 her son, Stanley Wilson, has been fighting to keep her garden and the club going to keep her legacy alive. Maintaining the gardens, maintaining the activities and the annual harvest fair is just the tip of the iceberg. Stanley Wilson wants to make Mabel Wilson Walk what his mother would have wanted it to be and more.

Funding

Funding to maintain the gardens as well as the duties of block captain and to keep the legacy of his mother, Mabel Wilson, alive has been quite difficult for Stanley Wilson. After suffering two (2) strokes recently, bleeding on the brain as well as other health issues, he is unable to work and uses his pensions and travels the city of Philadelphia to collect scrap metal to maintain these gardens and activities for the Central Club for Boys and Girls. He still soldiers on to keep his mother’s legacy alive, however, the funding is being stretched to its limits to purchase essential gardening items such as fencing, seeds, plant food, and other miscellaneous items.

There have been many volunteers to come aide in the maintenance and care of the garden, however, the Central Club for Boys and Girls would like to expand the garden on Mabel Wilson Walk and have a place of their own to plant and harvest their own plots. However, this is not feasible as funding is lax. Mr. Stanley Wilson and some volunteers are funding everything through his monthly pensions which are not sufficient in maintaining Mabel Wilson Walk, gardens, activities, events for club members, and the annual fair which will be celebrating its 69th year on August 8, 2015 to celebrate the legacy of Mabel Wilson.

The funding that we receive will go towards an expansion of the garden on Mabel Wilson Walk, sustainability of the Central Club for Boys and Girls, added programming, continued community programs, and the maintenance of the Scout’s Community Center.

Future Plans

With additional funding, Mabel Wilson Walk will be able to expand its programs and gardens along the 2500 block of Alter Street. This will allow for:

- Added gardens to be built for our children to learn and grow

- Added plots for the Central club members and the community to plant and learn about agriculture and horticultural programs

- An expansion of volunteerism and a complete beautification that will only keep Mabel Wilson Walk thriving, but for the neighboring buildings to stay operational as community centers, new programs, and bigger events to keep the community thriving and growing.

- Maintenance of the Scout's Community Center

- Grants and scholarships for club members to aid in furthering their education.

We believe in our children and through this we will help them flourish and become more well rounded members of the community.

Others Ways You Can Help

You can like, share, and subscribe to this campaign 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/centralclub4boysandgirls?fref=ts

                      https://www.facebook.com/groups/1593304237625147/?

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIEtJNrVqGrUdLQYQz9Wr8w

Website: https://centralclubforboysandgirlsphilly.wordpress.com/about/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/CC4BG

along the 2500 block of Alter Street. This will allow for:- Added gardens to be
built for our children to learn and grow- Added plots for the Central club members and the community to plant and
learn about agriculture and horticultural programs- An expansion of volunteerism and a complete beautification that will only
keep Mabel Wilson Walk thriving, but for the neighboring buildings to stay
operational as community centers, new programs, and bigger events to keep the
community thriving and growing.- Maintenance of the Scout's Community Center- Grants and scholarships for club members to aid in furthering their education.We believe in our children and through this we will help them flourish and become more well rounded members of the community.Others Ways You Can HelpYou can like, share, and subscribe to this campaign Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/centralclub4boysandgirls?fref=ts                      https://www.facebook.com/groups/1593304237625147/?Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIEtJNrVqGrUdLQYQz9Wr8wWebsite: https://centralclubforboysandgirlsphilly.wordpress.com/about/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CC4BG

story:
WHAT IS  

UPWine is an ambitious project, born to bring back to life objects belonging to Italian’s handcraft and design related to wine’s market. Stoppers and Foilcutters functional, colored, funny.

UPWine is a set of stylish stoppers and foilcutters suitable for several different needs: it can seal precious wine and beer bottles, providing elegance, fun, customization, appeal, uniqueness... and ensuring perfect wine protection up to 48 hours. Which of the available stoppers on the market con do that?

Moreover, UPWine provides suitable gift packets for every special occasion,in particular for New Year’s eve. 


THIS STORY

Andrea Radin, 30 years old coming from Friuli, near Venice, is making the wish of an old local entrepreneur come true, and is developing the UPWine project within his own company: Spazio Rete srl.

He has been involving friends and professionals in order to create an efficient support team: Nicoletta Melloni and Marinella Pignat joined the project. Together they began to search materials, technologies and machining, perfectly suited to renew the product and to make it fashionable in terms of quality and customization.

We have identified our business partners, companies to share this project with and perfect associates to create a flexible network. The goal will be to develop and       re-valorize Italian craftsmanship and design:

  • developing new products
  • catching other objects from the past making them current
  • integrating new digital technologies (already under development)
  • involving designers and artists

THE THREE

Prototypes have been created, stoppers’ capacity and foilcutters’ functionality have been tested; now Andrea Radin and his team are ready to show you the UPWine  line, a special gift both to make and to receive.


The "Stopper" for Prosecco/Spumante/Champagne built to preserve effervescenze for at least 48 hours.


The "Stopper" for still wines that avoids oxidation, keeps scents and aromas for at least 48 hours.

The "Foilcutter" allows the removal of still wine's foil safety and quickly.


 DESIGN 

Starting from the former project, we have improved the design of the UPWine products and we have enjoyed the process of studying and testing new materials, new colors, new technologies, basically a whole new set of ideas


UPSparkly - UPstill stoppers and the UPCut foilcutter are available in 5 different textures; the range goes from Basic to Soft Touch, including Metallic and Material, up to our top line products, coated in both Gold or White Gold finishing, named GOLDEN LEAF Classic Gold and GOLDEN LEAF White Gold. 

For the Indiegogo Campaign, we planned to supply 16 different colors distributed along the different textures:

1. Basic:  Matte Colors with Tactile Satin Finishing 

   

2. Soft Touch: Extra Matte Velvet Finishing  

3. Metallic:

The surface mirrors Shiny Reflexes in the Colors of copper, Champagne, Gold and Acid Green

   

4. Materics: Embellished and Natural Effects, like Denim or Sahraian Camouflage Finishing. Each piece is unique, each one different from any other

   

5. GOLDEN Leaf Classic Gold and GOLDEN Leaf White gold: Handmade precious coatings,  Counting up to 0,09 to 0,12 grams of white or classic Gold. Unique pieces, each one different from any other

For the indiegogo campaign, we plan to supply the following packets:   

  • 3 pieces box, including 1 UpSparky- 1 Upstill- 1 UpCut
  • Single piece havana box for Basic, Soft Touch, Metal and Material products
  • Single piece “elegance” box, designed for Leaf Classic Gold and Leaf White Gold

FEATURES

1. Materials

UPSparkly and UPStill do not contain any cork, wood, or other materials that might ruin the taste and aromas of the wine.

The three UPWine are made of plastic materials, mainly ABS, with soma metal components

2. Sustainability

The components are easily detachable, allowing them to be immediately recyclable. For an easy dismissal and recyclability.

3. Not Just wine, beer as well! Built for wine, suitable for beer too!

UPSparkly and UPStill can also be used to maintain the quality of craft beers in 75 cl bottles.


CAMPAIGNGOALS

After a whole year of hard work we have perfectly accomplished our sampling which allowed us to optimize the integration of different machinings. Now that our industrial partners have been identified, it’s time to start with the effective production of these fantastic objects.


These are the campaign goals:

●  GOAL 1 €25.000: full coverage of start-up production costs for the first serie of UPWine, intended for pioneering donors of Indiegogo

●  GOAL 2 €80.000: development of UPWine 2.0, turning the “cork” into a sharing system, entering the complex world of IoT (“Internet of things”).


REWARDS or PERKS: COMPOSITIONS AND CUSTOMIZATIONS

These are the available donations at your disposal and the relative rewards or “perks”: choose your combination according to your preferences or to make a special gift.

1) 1€ - Thanks

Welcome to our team! Every donation is important to achieve our goals. Your name will be included in our “Thanks” dashboard on the UPWune.com website, which is currently under construction

2) 20€ - "3 UPWine Color" (1 UPSparkly, 1 UPStill, 1 UPCut)

One packet made of 3 objects - 1 UPSparkly - 1 UPStill - 1 UPCut - available texture colors are: Basic, Soft Touch, Metalized or Materics.

3) 100€ - "3 UPWine Color" x5

5 packets made of 3 objects - 1 UPSparkly - 1 UPStill - 1 UPCut. For each packet you will be able to choose a color among available textures: Basic, Soft Touch, Metalized or Materics

4) 190€ - "3 UPWine Color" x10

10 packets made of 3 objects - 1 UPSparkly - 1 UPStill - 1 UPCut. For each packet you will be able to choose a color among available textures: Basic, Soft Touch, Metalized or Materics.

5) 105€ - 1 UPSparkly o 1 UPStill Color x15

15 single packets, choose among UPSparkly or UPStill. You will be able to choose up to three colors among available textures: Basic, Soft Touch, Metalized or Materics,

6) 340€ - 1 UPSparkly o 1 UPStill Color x50

50 single packets, choose among UPSparkly or UPStill. You will be able to choose color among available textures: Basic, Soft Touch, Metalized or Materics

7) 620€ - 1 UPSparkly o 1 UPStill Color x100 Custom

100 single packets, choose among UPSparkly or UPStill. You will be able to choose colors among available textures: Basic, Soft Touch, Metalized or Materics. It is also possible to customize the UPwine with your own Logo, image or claim. To check feasibility of each customization, please contact info@upwine.com

8) 35€ - 1 UPSparkly o 1 UPStill Leaf GOLD

One single packet, choose among Upsparkly or Upstill. It is possible to choose between  the Classic or White handmade gold coating. A special packaging will be crafted and a certificate of gold weighing will be included..

9) 100€ - "3 UPWine Leaf GOLD"

One packet made of three objects - 1 UPSparkly - 1 UPStill - 1 UPCut. For each packet you will be able to choose among hand laying of the Classic Golden Leaf or the White Golden Leaf. A special packaging will be crafted and a certificate of gold weighing will be included

10) 490€ - "3 UPWine Leaf GOLD" x5

5 packets made of three objects - 1 UPSparkly - 1 UPStill - 1 UPCut. For each packet you will be able to choose among hand laying of the Classic Golden Leaf or the White Golden Leaf. A special packaging will be crafted and a certificate of gold weighing will be included.

11) 950€ - "3 UPWine Leaf GOLD"x10

10 packets made of three objects - 1 UPSparkly - 1 UPStill - 1 UPCut. For each packet you will be able to choose among hand laying of the classic Golden Leaf or the White Golden Leaf. A special packaging will be crafted and a certificate of gold weighing will be included

12) 510€ - "1 UPSparkly o 1 UPStill Foglia ORO" x15

15 Single packets- choose among UPSparkly and UPStill.  For each packet you will be able to choose among hand laying of the classic Golden Leaf or the White Golden Leaf. A special packaging will be crafted and a certificate of gold weighing will be included

13) 1.600€ - "1 UPSparkly o 1 UPStill Leaf GOLD" x50

50 Single packets- choose among UPSparkly and UPStill.  For each packet you will be able to choose among hand laying of the classic Golden Leaf or the White Golden Leaf. A special packaging will be crafted and a certificate of gold weighing will be included

14) 3.000€ - "1 UPSparkly o 1 UPStill Foglia ORO" x100

100 Single packets- choose among UpSparkly and UpStill.  For each packet you will be able to choose among hand laying of the classic Golden Leaf or the White Golden Leaf. A special packaging will be crafted and a certificate of gold weighing will be included.

NOTES: 

  • If you want to choose different types of packets among those listed , please do not make a single donation , but one for each type of packet .
  • If you want to receive packets with different quantities/colors from those listed above, please contact us at info@upwine.com
  • For rewards requested by november 16th 2015, we believe packets will be delivered before Christmas festivities


USEFUL INFO

●  How can I choose my reward or “Perk” after my endowment?

Within 24 hours we will send you a form at the address of the relative donation. You will choose the Texture and the relative color according to the selected level of Reward or Perk

  • How can I add shipping cost?

By clicking on the selected donation you can modify the amount. In this occasion, remember to manually add the shipping costs if needed.

If, at the moment of the donation, you forget to include the shipping costs, you can add them later by clicking on “contribute” and typing: "No perk, I just want to contribute" then clicking on “continue to contribute” 

  •  Can i make my donation and/or recieve my reward with my Credit Card?

Yes. Remember: if you are not interested in creating a PayPal account, do not check the “Save this data on a PayPal account” option. Just go on clicking on “Recap and continue”..

  • How can i make my donation and/or request my reward if i do not have a credit card nor a PayPal account?

If you cannot pay with PayPal or Credit Card, please contact us at info@upwine.com


  • How can I ask for packets with different sets of colors, quantities and customizations?

Contact us at info@upwine.com to check feasibility of your request and to know the amount of your donation.


TEAM


Marinella Pignat - R&D | Andrea Radin - Project Leader | Nicoletta Melloni - Mktg


PARTNER

 

  


PER IL SOCIALE

UPWINE will support the “ TAPPODIVINO” project, www.tappodivino.it, created to collect funds for Onlus and Non Profit Organization by salvaging the used wooden cork caps. 


THANKS

Andrea Radin and his Team thank everyone for the attention, especially those who will send their contribution for the success of the UPWine project

A special thanks for advices and sharings!

story:
Hunger Insecurities

Tonight if you are going to bed with a full stomach, and you know where your next meal is coming from, consider yourself among the blessed:

  • Emmaus Mercy Meals is a committee of the Emmaus Lutheran Church in Poy Sippi Wisconsin.
  • We are more than just a place to get food.  We are a solution to a much bigger issue.
  • Helping this mission, not only feeds people in far away lands ravaged by storms, wars, and economic downfall, it puts people to work that otherwise could not find jobs.  So helping there helps people here!

It Takes More Than Money

Here is how you can help:

  • If you're near by (Poy Sippi Wisconsin) you can come help us pack meals 5 days a week every week of the year.
  • Spread the word.  (Share with at least 10 people.) Get people energized to help build this program with prayer, physical support and financial backing.
  • Contact us to see if we can bring a fellowship feast to your organization or church.

Hope Explodes

Your dollars go to support our goal, feeding millions of meals throughout the world. In addition to that:

  • You will help employee many hard to place workers.
  • Give hope to those less fortunate.
  • Save the lives of those who may someday grow to save your life.

It's Not Always Easy

There are many great organizations helping people, and all of us struggle to bring our cause to the front.  We not only feed people world wide but right here at home as well.

  • We strive daily to be the best solution for the people and lives we serve.

Other Ways You Can Help

We have been there, so we understand you can still help even without sending funds:

  • You can PRAY - Jesus is always listening.
  • We need support staff to answer phone calls and take orders for our "Meals For Me" program.
  • You can help raise funds by hosting a fund-raising activity.

Thank you in advance for any support you can give!

Phone: 1 (888) 502-1332
www.emmausmercymeals.org
info@emmausmercymeals.org

story:
Short Summary

Cum Get Sum LLC/ Sin Energy Drink is developing a new social lifestyle energy drink formulated for men and women designed to provide a healthier body, mental clarity, and stamina. Our key component is unique to all of these qualities. The primary component is called an adaptogen. An adaptogen helps balance the mind and body of each individual allowing it to adapt and overcome obstacles with in that individual. Our product’s formulation is based upon real life situations and can be used by those with diabetes or kidney disease. It also acts as an antioxidant to remove toxins and can tonify the kidneys and liver.

We are in the final stages of completing our formula and releasing our product to consumers. We have distributors and independents ready to place our product. There is no other product available at this time that uses our formula engineering. This allows us a unique position in the marketplace. We have combined the benefits of standard energy drinks and have added todays most common sought after desire, sex. While most energy drinks are made with the cheapest ingredients to maximize profits and rarely focus on the consumers true overall health, we use only the best most natural ingredients and have formulated our product to reduce most overlooked health dangers such as phosphorus, carbohydrates, caffeine, calories, sugars, and sodium. Our founders have experienced firsthand the problems that can arise from the consumption of most of today’s energy drinks on the market. It is our goal to affect a change for the future and provide a product that works to benefit each individual both short and long term.

We have found through countless research the increasing numbers in those that are unable to enjoy an energy drink product because it does not meet all the desires and health issues of the consumer; including cost. The availability of our product will open many consumption avenues for individuals that currently do not exist. Our pricing is comparative to market standards and by removing unnecessary expenses we will not only be successful but able to continue to develop and introduce new products in the future.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking contributions of $25,000 to help complete the formula of our product. Product development can be quite expensive especially when you are creating something that does not exist. Our founders have personally funded this project to get to this point and will continue to do so in order to bring our product to a very much needed market. We believe that utilizing this type of funding forum we will be able to increase awareness and overall customer base. Our cost may be reduced as our scientific research continues.

Our rewards or perks allow people to be part of something bigger than just another energy drink company. It allows contributors and non-contributors to be part of a campaign that reaches out to those that feel the constant weight of “can I” or “can’t I“.

1. Individuals with diabetes, kidney and liver problems are limited to or denied every day products most enjoy do to the ingredients, additives, and preservatives they contain, including energy drinks. Thanks to you our product can reduce some of that weight and allow them to enjoy something that so many others do. 

2. Individuals that need a boost in the desire department that do not want, need, or can’t take prescription enhancement drugs. Thanks to you our product can fuel ones desires with a balanced natural increase of fluids inside the body to the appropriate location for both men and women without concern only performance.

3. Sport hip/ trendy apparel that is guaranteed to get you noticed, open a conversation, and in some cases attract the opposite sex. All thanks to you. 

All funds received if funding goal is not met will go towards the above mentioned campaign. Any additional funding beyond the goal will be allotted to social media, website enhancement, and entering into full production.

The Impact

Our products impact in the market allows a significant change in the social lifestyle scene. We provide an all-in-one energy drink that addresses many issues. Allowing the adaptation of an individual’s mind and body naturally. A product that can be enjoyed by individuals without the side effects and potential dangers of other products available (legal or illegal). To be able to enhance a mood, increase performance, balance the body, and calm the mind all at once. A product that does not deny those with increasingly becoming common health issues.

As stated earlier our founders have dealt with these issues first hand. For instance, one of our founders has brother that is 30 years of age and suffering from Diabetes and End Stage Renal Disease or ESRD. His condition is due to the direct use of energy drinks. His diabetes caused him to feel tired and constantly out of energy. In order for to make it through a work day he would use energy drinks to get him thru. While he was able to control his sugars with insulin he was not aware that the overlooked phosphorus and sodium content along with the diabetes itself was slowly damaging his kidneys. He is now on dialysis and awaiting a transplant. His life consists of daily dialysis and doctors’ appointments. Our founder being involved with his daily care has actively got involved with the research of products available for those in his situation. The treatment in itself is exhausting and creates a multitude of other issues. Products available today cannot be used by someone in his condition and should be carefully considered by others that may have the potential for his condition.  We are dedicated to the completion and production of our product. We have combined an edginess to attract all consumers and a bit of hip to those that face so much.

Risks & Challenges

Strengths

Our strengths stand in the unique formulation of our product. We do not follow the same path that so many others have chosen in formulating there product. Many simply try to reproduce what others have already done. We have found that this is the biggest problem when trying to compete with the majors. Many of the standard ingredients in today’s energy drinks are becoming old news and in some cases attracting negative attention. Consumers are looking for not only something new but different than the others. Our pricing and the unique formulation of our product is a direct answer to the consumers.

Threats

We believe the biggest threat we face is that there is no way to protect the replication of our product once on the market. The law does not allow us or any other beverage company to copy write or patent a formula for a product. We have been very careful not to release too much information about our product with regards to exact formulation. We have also taken the steps to require non- disclosures with those we have relationships. We have not allowed samples to be distributed so that we can minimize the possibilities of replication. We have legal counsel on retainer and will have insurances in place to help protect us from situations.

The Competitors

In the energy drink beverages industry, customers make choices based upon taste, effect, and cost. The largest levels of competition in the market are the majors. Red Bull and Monster account for about 70% of the market. This may seem high but compared to five years ago when they held 90% they are losing ground every year due to new products and manufactures entering the market. Outside of this we feel the level of competition is moderate due to the many variations of the energy drink market. From waters to energy shots. We find solace in social lifestyle.

Qualifications and Plan

Qualifications/ Team Members

Robert Maxwell, Member: Mr. Maxwell has extensive experience in business development. He has owned and operated an array of business from bar/nightclubs to healthcare services facilities. He has been trained in the area of Electro- Neuro Diagnostic by Nicolet Bio Medical Institute and has recognition in this field from Duke University. His major achievements have most notable in the civil rights arena receiving the Key to the City in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico for his work providing assistance to Mexican citizens in Mexico and the U.S. His business accomplishments have been the successful development of several startups that were later merged or acquired by larger entities.

Andrew Piekalkiewicz, Member: Mr. Piekalkiewicz has been an active Attorney specializing in various fields of litigation and defense. He is a graduate of the University of Texas Law School and has numerous hours of continuing legal education. His major accomplishments include a successful law practice as well as a veteran of the military.

Joe De La Cerda, Member: Mr. De La Cerda has 25 years as a Certified Paralegal, primarily experienced in business and business litigation. He is a graduate of the University of Houston Clear Lake. Mr. De La Cerda is a current member of Mexican American Bar Association and the current Chairman of their Paralegal Committee, which he has held that position for the past 4 years.

Our company has created a brand that is highly sought after in the social lifestyle scene. We have aligned ourselves with celebrities and injected ourselves into the social media markets. We have created interests in the major box stores in the U.S. and Brazil. We are also being sought to participate in the EDM music scene which is now becoming the hottest trend in the lifestyle scene. We have pending customers awaiting the launch of our product as well as distributors.

During the representation of a legal client we were introduced to the energy drink beverage industry. In representing this client we were required to conduct extensive research into this industry and our conclusion determined the energy drink market is a $27.5 Billion dollar industry, approximately $13 billion in the U.S. alone which is expected to increase to over $18 billion by year 2018. Furthermore, the market currently is becoming the new soda or lifestyle beverage for age demographics ranging from 18 to 35 for both men and women.

Our findings lead us to the decision to create our own unique energy beverage targeted towards social lifestyle. The age demographics mentioned above are drawn to social standing or acceptance by way of beauty, sexuality, fitness, and edginess. After researching energy beverage formulas, both on and off the market, we consulted with several beverage scientists specializing in energy drinks to formulate our own unique product.

Plan

We are continuously working with experts in the beverage industry to assist us in overcoming challenges that our qualifications do not cover. We have developed and secured relationships with individuals in purchase order and invoice financing to assist us in the move to full production once we have completed our formula.

Our plan for marketing will be focused on direct interaction through social media, celebrity endorsements, radio/TV, and local publications. We have already started this process and have found great success. We do plan to interact with certain big venue events annually to establish hands on relationship with our consumers. These methods are best for our product since it is about helping consumers fulfill desires of an enhanced social lifestyle. We found that the success of new products was largely contributed to branding and creating a demand before availability. Companies that spend countless dollars in manufacturing and production before creating a brand and demand take longer to profit and in some instances end up with inventory they can’t get rid of. We have started branding and creating demand. We have taken extreme consideration and care in becoming the hot new energy. Our customers have and will continue to find us through our website and social media outlets.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would like to thank all that took the time look at this unique opportunity to be a part of the energy drink future. For those that contribute and those that do not, we feel privileged to share our information and hopefully educate some. It would come with great appreciation if you took the time to share this information with someone and open a discussion about our product. Your word can be as valuable as a contribution. We do respond to all emails to answer questions so feel free. 

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word.

Short Summary

Cum Get Sum LLC/ Sin Energy Drink is developing a new
social lifestyle energy drink formulated for men and women designed to provide
a healthier body, mental clarity, and stamina. Our key component is unique to
all of these qualities. The primary component is called an adaptogen. An
adaptogen helps balance the mind and body of each individual allowing it to adapt
and overcome obstacles with in that individual. Our product’s formulation is
based upon real life situations and can be used by those with diabetes or
kidney disease. It also acts as an antioxidant to remove toxins and can tonify
the kidneys and liver. 
We are in the final stages of completing our formula
and releasing our product to consumers. We have distributors and independents
ready to place our product. There is no other product available at this time
that uses our formula engineering. This allows us a unique position in the
marketplace. We have combined the benefits of standard energy drinks and have
added todays most common sought after desire, sex. While most energy drinks are
made with the cheapest ingredients to maximize profits and rarely focus on the
consumers true overall health, we use only the best most natural ingredients
and have formulated our product to reduce most overlooked health dangers such
as phosphorus, carbohydrates, caffeine, calories, sugars, and sodium. Our
founders have experienced firsthand the problems that can arise from the
consumption of most of today’s energy drinks on the market. It is our goal to
affect a change for the future and provide a product that works to benefit each
individual both short and long term.

increasing numbers in those that are unable to enjoy an energy drink product

future.

much needed market. We believe that utilizing this type of funding forum we

reduced as our scientific research continues.

allow people to be part of something bigger than just another energy drink

a boost in the desire department that do not want, need, or can’t take
prescription enhancement drugs. Thanks to you our product can fuel ones desires

location for both men and women without concern only performance.

apparel that is guaranteed to get you noticed, open a conversation, and in some
cases attract the opposite sex. All thanks to you.

funding goal is not met will go towards the above mentioned campaign. Any
additional funding beyond the goal will be allotted to social media, website
enhancement, and entering into full production.

story:
Summary

We are a collection of businessmen, scientists, teachers, and other specialists who have one thing in common........A LOVE for special needs children and the challenges their families face. One of the hardest things to do as a family with a special needs child, is to find activities that can include and delight every family member.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to show grassroots community support for the project. Multiple corporate sponsorships are promised if the community shows interest.

Any donation, no matter how small, will go directly to the building of a multiphase fun and learning center for special needs children. Events that are inclusive to each type of disability are being designed by Child Advocates. Go cart racing, an autism room, laser tag......Fun for every family member!!!

The Impact

Imagine a place where a child can have fun with their family in a safe, well designed environment...where all are equal despite challenges they face....laughter, family together time, specially designed go carts to accommodate physical handicaps, quiet rooms to soothe a child with autism......Fun keeps families together!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to help in ways other than a financial contribution, volunteer, share....share....share!!!!
