story:
Those of you who know me know I've been in the mindset to run a business for some time. I have found the means to create a business.  I came to this idea when I realized I can do better for myself by running my own business. I want to work and make money on my own terms. I found a corporation that works with people in my situation in finding the exact finances and services needed to get started. I need $6500 to start this business process and I can't do this alone- I've tried but with no success.

We want to build an atmosphere that would feel like you are in the dragons cave. Dimmed lights to allow a water like reflection on cave walls. A small area filled with gold and silver bean bags around a table called "The Dragons Treasure." Seats and tables molded to look like they were cut from stone. We will have the most knowledgeable and friendly staff available, I will personally see to their training.

What I offer is a better way to smoke, I offer a relaxing atmosphere, not cramped, and not crowded. I envision a place where you can come and enjoy the company you came with. Live entertainment on the weekends such as local bands. Specials for customers who attend often. What is needed to make this real is you contribution, $1, $2, $5, $100. Whatever you can manage towards this endeavour is truly appreciated.

Together lets break through the stereotype bonds of how a hookah lounge should be. Lets make this our own.

story:
Who We Are

We are BLACKSMITH BARBELL, and we believe that records only exist to be broken. 

 

Client Spotlight: Camile

Training with Shane Atticus Smith has truly been life changing for me, especially in what now know to be possible. Being an athlete of " smaller stature,” certain phrases were all too familiar when it came to my strength and lifting. "You are just too small…you will never be able to lift heavy unless you gain weight…you are not the right build for weightlifting." Or my favorite, "Stick to what you are good at: running or bodyweight movements." While running and body movements such as pull-ups and muscle-ups came quite easily to me, lifting heavy did not! However, I can still remember the first time I ever felt a barbell in my hands—I guess you could say it was " love at first touch."  But time and time again I became discouraged when I got stuck at a particular lift, especially when lifting next to a girl who outweighed me by 20+ pounds continued to improve her numbers!

As a lifelong athlete, I have tried my fair share of strength and lifting programs. I also have had numerous coaches and trainers from all different walks of life and backgrounds. And while I have learned from each and every one, I truly have never seen or felt the results as those I’ve experienced since starting my training with Atticus.

 At 40 years old I can truly say that I am stronger and in better shape than I ever have been in my entire life! Atticus has taught me that if you train smart and correctly, results will come no matter your age. He has shown me what my training was lacking and has helped me turn my weaknesses into strengths. My body is indeed capable—I can now do things I once believed to be impossible. 

Training his way, like a powerlifter, is NOT easy!  It takes time and much dedication. And heck, I honestly can say that I have even shed a few tears! Sometimes it hurts, but only in good ways—I have never been injured since training with Atticus. He pushes me to places that I never have been before, but when I'm done training and my session is over I'm not only physically stronger but I'm mentally stronger as well.

I know now that if you train HARD, train RIGHT, and train SMART, size really doesn’t matter; even little girls can lift heavy things! Thank you, Atticus!!!

 

From the Editor: Origin Story

My story begins several years ago when I, a lifelong beanpole, was trying to pack on lean muscle. I was drowning in protein shakes and egg whites. Three years and 60 pounds later I reviewed my logbook, smugly impressed by how far I’d come. I was bench pressing 260 and deadlifting 380 to the wide-eyed wonderment of my fellow gym attendees. I was strong! 

 

Or so I thought.

 

One day I saw a video online featuring my brother—sporting nearly a buck sixty body weight—training with powerlifters in Ohio. I easily outweighed him by 40 pounds, yet here he was deadlifting 500 pounds like it was a feather pillow! More than I could lift even once on my best day, he was lifting massive weights multiple times in succession without even breaking a sweat!

 

Seeing him lift so much so easily was a much-needed reality check to my ego. I realized I needed better training and expertise beyond dotcom fitness forums. I moved 2,000 miles across the country to join my brother to train with giants, surrounded by some of the strongest men and women on the planet.

 

And now that we've returned we want to pay it forward by providing a space for specialized strength training in Cache Valley for the rest of the Mountain West region! 

 

 

The Vision

We started Blacksmith Barbell with a singular mission: to produce top-tier athletes in a world-class strength facility. This region has a deep well of untapped potential. There are so many talented, hardworking people in the area with the ability and drive to become Olympians, champion fighters, collegiate/professional athletes, and legendary lifters. Our goal is to complete the equation by providing knowledgeable strength training experience; we want athletes from all over the Wild West draped in gold medals and standing on the world's tallest podiums.

 

 

We Can't Do This Without You

The truth is you won't get strong on a treadmill. A gym that forges elite athletes needs weight. Lots of it! Making individuals or teams strong requires hefty pounds, and pounds cost pounds (or dollars). We have the building, now we need your help to transform it. 

 

 

We are raising funds primarily for necessary building improvements. Our greatest goal is to raise the money needed to open the doors of our facility as soon as possible. Timing is the most critical factor for our high school and college athletes hoping to develop the skills and power necessary to win scholarships and catch the eye of recruiting scouts for professional camp invitations while they’re still of age.

 

In the event that we reach our goal, any surplus funds raised will go directly toward equipment including: high quality bars that won’t bend when our athletes start bench pressing 600 pounds; plates and dumbbells big enough to intimidate Clydesdales; and machines that our trainees will love to hate. We can’t make the journey alone. We need you!

 

In the event that we don’t raise the funds necessary to purchase the minimum amount of equipment right from day one, then let us thank you and assure you that your contributions will be piled in with any amount of loans, savings, treasure maps, livestock barters, Girl Scout cookie sales, diamond heists, and alchemy necessary to fund this adventure—it’s not a matter of if, but when!

 

 

Impact

We’re going to put Cache Valley on the map as the location for high-level strength training and powerlifting. We want Logan to dominate Utah’s record books. We want local businesses to flourish from the crowds we attract, and we want to provide opportunities for students and athletes.

 

And we’re already on our way! We have several athletes contending for new world records within the next two years, and with the proper training, instruction, and sufficient weight to challenge their abilities, success is within reach!

 

Much planning and input has been taken into consideration to provide donors with valuable and usable rewards for their support. Thanks to everyone for your help and feedback along the way! Reaching the starting line is the biggest hurdle, so any contribution you can make is greatly appreciated, whether it’s $1 or $10,000.  This Cache Valley legacy that we build will be one that the greater Rocky Mountain region can be proud of and rally around; everything starts and ends by working together with the desire to create something spectacular!
story_txt:
Who
We Are
We are BLACKSMITH BARBELL, and we believe that
records only exist to be broken. 

 
Client Spotlight: Camile


Training with Shane
Atticus Smith has truly been life changing for me, especially in what now know
to be possible. Being an athlete of " smaller stature,” certain
phrases were all too familiar when it came to my strength and lifting. "You
are just too small…you will never be able to lift heavy unless you gain weight…you
are not the right build for weightlifting." Or my favorite, "Stick to
what you are good at: running or bodyweight movements." While running
and body movements such as pull-ups and muscle-ups came quite easily to me,
lifting heavy did not! However, I can still remember the first time I ever felt
a barbell in my hands—I guess you could say it was " love at first
touch."  But time and time again I became discouraged when I got
stuck at a particular lift, especially when lifting next to a girl who
outweighed me by 20+ pounds continued to improve her numbers!
As a lifelong athlete,
I have tried my fair share of strength and lifting programs. I also have had
numerous coaches and trainers from all different walks of life and backgrounds.
And while I have learned from each and every one, I truly have never seen or felt
the results as those I’ve experienced since starting my training with Atticus.
 At 40 years old
I can truly say that I am stronger and in better shape than I ever have been in
my entire life! Atticus has taught me that if you train smart and correctly, results
will come no matter your age. He has shown me what my training was lacking and
has helped me turn my weaknesses into strengths. My body is indeed capable—I
can now do things I once believed to be impossible. Training his way,
like a powerlifter, is NOT easy!  It takes time and much dedication. And
heck, I honestly can say that I have even shed a few tears! Sometimes it hurts,
but only in good ways—I have never been injured since training with Atticus. He
pushes me to places that I never have been before, but when I'm done training
and my session is over I'm not only physically stronger but I'm mentally
stronger as well.
I know now that if
you train HARD, train RIGHT, and train SMART, size really doesn’t matter;
even little girls can lift heavy things! Thank you, Atticus!!!

 
From
the Editor: Origin Story
My story begins several years ago when I, a lifelong
beanpole, was trying to pack on lean muscle. I was drowning in protein shakes
and egg whites. Three years and 60 pounds later I reviewed my logbook, smugly
impressed by how far I’d come. I was bench pressing 260 and deadlifting 380 to
the wide-eyed wonderment of my fellow gym attendees. I was strong! 

 
Or so I thought.
 
One day I saw a video online featuring my brother—sporting
nearly a buck sixty body weight—training with powerlifters in Ohio. I easily
outweighed him by 40 pounds, yet here he was deadlifting 500 pounds like it was
a feather pillow! More than I could lift even once on my best day, he was
lifting massive weights multiple times in succession without even breaking a
sweat!
 
Seeing him lift so much so easily was a much-needed reality
check to my ego. I realized I needed better training and expertise beyond
dotcom fitness forums. I moved 2,000 miles across the country to join my brother
to train with giants, surrounded by some of the strongest men and women on the
planet.
 
And now that we've returned we want to pay it forward by
providing a space for specialized strength training in Cache Valley for the
rest of the Mountain West region! 
 
 
The
Vision
We started Blacksmith Barbell with a singular mission: to
produce top-tier athletes in a world-class strength facility. This region has a
deep well of untapped potential. There are so many talented, hardworking people

purchase the minimum amount of equipment right from day one, then let us thank
you and assure you that your contributions will be piled in with any amount of
loans, savings, treasure maps, livestock barters, Girl Scout cookie sales,

story:
THE WHY..THE HOW..THE WHAT


THE WHY

United Structural Associates believes in challenging the status quo, in doing things differently while providing society with a safe, green, energy efficient and financially beneficial structural system, whether it be residential, commercial or governmental.

THE HOW

With over fifty (50) years experience in the metallurgical, architectural, structural, mechanical, aeronautical, construction and engineering industries, Chuck Russillo, USA's founder and president,  has spent the last ten (10) years researching and developing a revolutionary methodology.  With the support and encouragement of his wife Silvia, he has developed a new structural building system. 
  • A system that is GREEN.
  • A system that in essence is stronger than the sum of its parts.
  • A system that is composed of innovative composites and re-engineered EPS.
  • A system that will revolutionize the construction industry worldwide.
  • A system made and assembled in the United States by veterans.

THE WHAT

United Structural Associates' structural system solves  three key issues associated with the construction industry -  TIME, COST and QUALITY.
   
TIME
Our system ...
  • is 30% to 50% faster than standard construction to build.
COST
Our system ...
  • is 20% to 30% less costly than standard construction.
  • significantly reduces heating and cooling costs.
QUALITY - (Click on associated link to see video and/or documentary evidence.)
Depending on matrix and design our system ...
  • is non-toxic.
  • is fireproof (Go to video #3)
  • is mold proof.
  • is waterproof. (Go to video #4)        
  • is termite proof.
  • withstood CAT 5 Hurricane impact and beyond.
  • has an insulation value ranging from R15 to R60.
  • has an axial load capability of over 25 tons per square foot (without its metal frame) as per Georgia Pacific.
  • is ten times lighter than concrete and significantly stronger. (Go to videos #1 & #5)
  • eliminates drywall.
  • has a continuous interlocking system between walls, roof, floor and slab, assuring unprecedented building strength.
  • based on design, contains electrical conduit and plumbing that are easily accessible for new buildings, repair and renovation.

OUR NEED

United Structural Associates requires funding:
  • To enlarge and expand our component assembly plant(s).
  • To hire and train area veterans in component assembly. 
  • To establish free veteran owned and operated franchises to install our  structures. 
  • To market our structural system nationwide and worldwide.
For your financial support United Structural Associates has developed a wide assortment of perks.

PERKS

We encourage you to compare our structural perks with vendors in your area. Remember in your comparison that all our structural perks have an insulation value of R15, contain electrical conduit for easy wiring, do not need drywall and are termite proof, waterproof, and fireproof.

United Structural Associates Provides:

  1.  assembled wall and ceiling panels, insulated (R15 ) and equipped with conduit for electrical wiring  (except for the Dog House perk).
  2. the steel ribbed roofing panels, door and windows, shipped separately and not included in the shipping charges.
  3.  an easy to read assembly manual.
  4.  non-toxic, fireproof, mold proof, termite proof and water proof panels.
  5.  a donation to a 501(c)(3) Veteran Service Organization from all "perks".

Recipient Provides:

  1. compliance with local building codes for necessary permits.
  2. payment for all shipping costs except for the steel ribbed roofing panels, doors and windows (these items are shipped separately and free of charge).
  3. any necessary material handling equipment  - pallet jack, dolly, etc. - and tools.
  4. any necessary permits. (Sealed drawings  cost an added $75)

FAQ

QUESTION: What do the sheds look like?

ANSWER: Here are renderings (not to scale), of all the sheds available as perks. Individual pictures will appear in the Gallery section.


QUESTION: Can we change the door to a double door and add more windows?

ANSWER: Yes, but there is an added charge.  You will have to contact customer service for pricing at 561 - 800 - 4731.

QUESTION: How much is the shipping cost?

ANSWER: Shipping costs vary. We will call you regarding shipping costs. All ribbed steel roofing panels, windows and doors are shipped separately and free of charge.

QUESTION: Does the interior need a special paint?

ANSWER: No.

QUESTION: Can we change the exterior vinyl panels to another type?

ANSWER: Yes, but there is an additional charge.  Contact customer service for style and pricing at 561 - 800 - 4731.

QUESTION: Can we reposition windows and doors?

ANSWER: Yes. There is NO charge for repositioning the door and windows included in the perk.

QUESTION: What is the roof like, what color is it?

ANSWER: Our roof/ceiling panel has to be sealed with ribbed steel roofing panels. The color of the ribbed steel roofing panel is silver. To change the color you will have contact customer service for pricing at 561 - 800 - 4731 . There is an added cost to change colors. The ribbed steel roofing panels are shipped separately with the windows and doors at no extra charge. 

QUESTION: Since the panels have conduit, can plumbing be added?

ANSWER: Yes. There are specific panels for plumbing fixtures at an added cost.  Contact customer service for pricing at 561 - 800 - 4731.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you can't contribute or get a "PERK", that doesn't mean you can't help:
"LIKE" us on our Facebook page by using the Indiegogo share tools.
Tell your friends and associates to "LIKE" us also by using the Indiegogo share tools!

  And that's all there is to it.

There are specific panels for plumbing fixtures at an added cost.  Contact customer service for pricing at 561 - 800 - 4731.OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPIf you can't contribute or get a "PERK", that doesn't mean you can't help:"LIKE" us on our Facebook page by using the Indiegogo share tools.Tell your friends and associates to "LIKE" us also by using the Indiegogo share tools!  And that's all there is to it.

story:
It was on a cold and wet poolside some 15 years ago when Lee and Charlie first met. At that moment neither of the aspiring athletes could have predicted that together they would rise through the ranks of British swimming and both go on to represent Great Britain at numerous international events.  Back then nutrition, like them, was in its early developments and by trying the good, the bad, the calorific and sometimes even the home made of the supplement world they developed an in-depth knowledge and passion for diet and nutrition.

What quickly became clear to Lee and Charlie was that the nutrition market was a sea of complex and unpronounceable buzzwords, chemical symbols and marketing jargon that left many customers being either put off or, worse still, encouraged to purchase products with ineffective and unnecessary extras.

They grew increasingly frustrated at the often-confusing world of nutrition and through shared experiences (and over the odd wheat grass smoothie) decided to form Neat Nutrition with the aim of eradicating these confusions by creating a premium nutritional brand with simple effective ingredients that is suitable for every lifestyle. 


Welcome to Neat Nutrition, we are dedicated to developing premium products for every lifestyle. In a market that is often overly complex our goal is to strip away jargon to deliver a 'neat' and easy to understand range of the highest quality products. All of our products are made using 100% natural flavourings and sweeteners and our philosophy is to: 

  1. Show provenance by giving customers a full understanding of where our ingredients are sourced from
  2. Remove ambiguity by embracing simplicity and only offering essential products that actually make a difference
  3. Educate consumers by showing them how high-quality proteins and nutrients can benefit them whatever their lifestyle
  4. Help you reach your goals whatever they may be, from increasing vitality, losing weight or competing at the Olympic Games




Protein powders: Neat Nutrition protein powders are made using only the finest ingredients ensuring that they mix easily and taste fantastic. They are suitable for use alone or can be added to your favourite juice, smoothie or even morning porridge.

  • Whey Protein: Neat Nutrition’s lean protein contains the highest quality organic whey sourced from grass fed cows; we are very proud of the fact that it’s free from any artificial flavourings, colouring and sweeteners.
  • Lean Whey Protein: Neat Nutrition’s lean protein is a bespoke mix of our whey protein combined with effective weight loss ingredients including our high-grade organic Matcha Green Tea, CLA and L-carnitine. This product has been developed to promote fat loss whilst maintaining lean muscle.
  • Vegan Protein: Sourced from the finest quality organic hemp and pea protein and free from any artificial flavourings, colouring and sweeteners. We have not compromised on taste, its taken endless research to ensure that its also as great tasting as it is good for you. Packed full of dense nutrients and essential amino acids providing an ideal protein source for both Vegans and allergen sufferers alike.

Supergreens: Neat Nutrition’s ‘Supergreens’ is packed with 20 high quality and nutrient dense food sources including, Green Kale, Spirulina and Avocado powder. Each one is a fantastic source of vitamins, minerals and antioxidants. The ingredients are 100% natural and non-genetically modified with no fillers, artificial colourings, flavours or sweeteners.

Organic Matcha Green Tea: We have poured over 100s of samples and different grades of Matcha Green Tea to ensure that we have used the highest quality organic powder available. Our Matcha Green tea is 100% natural and packed with vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, and amino acids offering unparalleled nutritional benefits. To match the health benefits of Matcha Green Tea you would need to drink 10 cups of regular Green Tea.

BCAA Powder: Neat Nutrition’s BCAA (branch chain amino acids) powder provides essential amino acids the body can’t produce itself to enable it to naturally help repair damaged muscles and increase muscle function. Our BCAA powder contains no fillers, sweeteners or colourings, is 100% pure and consists of premium grade Leucine, Isoleucine & Valine split into the optimal 2:1:1 ratio (Leucine 50%, Isoleucine 25%, Valine 25%).

Fat Burner: It's taken a lot of all-night sampling sessions but we have created an effective fat burner that is free form artificial sources of caffeine. Instead it utilises natural sources such as Matcha Green Tea and Guarana, alongside proven fat loss ingredients such as L-carnitine & CLA. This means you shouldn’t get that unnatural ‘jittery’ and ‘shaky’ feeling that most heavily caffeine-stuffed fat burners give you.

Complete Multivitamins: This complete Multivitamin contains 100% of your RDA but is also enhanced with the addition of complex high-grade minerals and nutrients making it one of the most effective available. Not only improving overall vitality and well-being but aiding with physical performance and recovery.

Please email us if you require full product specifications including nutritional data and ingredients list (founders@neat-nutrition.com)


Neat Nutrition wants to educate you in how to make healthy and achievable lifestyle changes and create premium natural products that support this. Supporting this campaign will allow us to develop clear and easy to understand products that can be used in every lifestyle. Your support is invaluable and funding this campaign will allow us to reach our goals plus, you get that warm fuzzy feeling of being a trendsetter and early adopter of a high quality product and healthy company!

Don’t forget our campaign hashtags are #NeatNutrition and #iamNeat so spread the word and help a great new product come to life!

Instagram: neat_nutrition

Twitter: @neat_nutrition

Facebook: facebook.com/neatnutrition


"It's incredibly moreish, hard to believe you're drinking a 100% natural nutritional product" Lawyer and Ironman competitor, Joe (31), London

“I love that because it is 100% natural you don’t get a bitter medicinal after taste” PR Director, Ellen (31), London

“It’s so important to know that these products are 100% natural whilst still tasting great” Triple Olympian and Olympic Silver medallist, Maggie (58), Nottingham

“Great mixability, no lumps even after one shake” Swimming Teacher and aesthetic fitness model, Robert (33), Sheffield

“It’s very easy to drink and because there are no artificial sugars you don’t feel bloated or have a sickly feeling that so many shakes give you” Regular gym-goer and sometimes marathon runner, Helena (63), Bath

“It's so smooth and thick, great taste” Recruitment Consultant, Tom (29), Leeds

"As a busy mum, and being a vegan, this product is an excellent supplement to my healthy diet and busy lifestyle, it tastes fantastic alone or in smoothies!" Lawyer and Mum, Laura (31), Gatwick

"Amazing product, it even tastes great with water as everything is natural!" Group Financial Controller, Richard (31), Brighton

“As a 60 year old female still training and competing in sport this is the perfect product for me – it is 100% natural and it tastes great!!” Business owner and former Olympian, Diana (60), Shrewsbury


  • 6th April – Indiegogo campaign completes and all orders are collated
  • 7th-30th April – All raw materials are ordered and delivered to manufacturing facility 
  • 1st May – eCommerce site goes live
  • May – All Indiegogo orders are confirmed, flavours chosen, delivery addresses confirmed, delivery costs paid (depending on final shipping location), products packaged and sent fresh to your door step to enjoy

[NOTE: all dates in timeline are estimates and while we will endeavour to hit these (if not exceed) they do not represent a confirmed process!]

Delivery charges: all of our products will incur a delivery charge to cover the cost of shipping, we promise to keep this as low as possible! (we will ask for this in advance of sending your order). Note that if delivering outside of the UK you are liable for any customs duty at import.

Experience based perks with the Neat Nutrition team are based on purchaser travelling to London.  If other locations are desired we are more than happy to travel but travel costs will be added.

Flavours and product choices (when applicable) we also be collected before delivery to ensure you get the product and flavour of your choice!

Please email us for more detailed shipping estimates for the product you wish to purchase (founders@neat-nutrition.com)

ingredients such as L-carnitine & CLA. This means you shouldn’t get that
unnatural ‘jittery’ and ‘shaky’ feeling that most heavily caffeine-stuffed fat
burners give you. 
Complete Multivitamins:
This complete Multivitamin contains 100% of your RDA but is also enhanced with
the addition of complex high-grade minerals and nutrients making it one of the
most effective available. Not only improving overall vitality and well-being
but aiding with physical performance and recovery.
Please email us if you require full product
specifications including nutritional data and ingredients list (founders@neat-nutrition.com)
Neat Nutrition wants to educate you in how to make
healthy and achievable lifestyle changes and create premium natural products
that support this. Supporting this campaign will allow us to develop clear and
easy to understand products that can be used in every lifestyle. Your support
is invaluable and funding this campaign will allow us to reach our goals plus,
you get that warm fuzzy feeling of being a trendsetter and early adopter of a
high quality product and healthy company!
Don’t forget our campaign hashtags are #NeatNutrition
and #iamNeat so spread the word and help a great new product come to life!

Instagram: neat_nutritionTwitter: @neat_nutritionFacebook: facebook.com/neatnutrition
"It's incredibly moreish, hard to believe you're drinking a 100%
natural nutritional product" Lawyer and Ironman competitor, Joe (31), London
“I love that because it is 100% natural you don’t get a bitter medicinal
after taste” PR Director, Ellen (31), London
“It’s so important to know that these products are 100% natural whilst still
tasting great” Triple Olympian and Olympic Silver medallist, Maggie (58), Nottingham
“Great mixability, no lumps even after one shake” Swimming Teacher and aesthetic fitness model, Robert (33), Sheffield
“It’s very easy to drink and because there are no artificial sugars you
don’t feel bloated or have a sickly feeling that so many shakes give you” Regular gym-goer and sometimes marathon runner, Helena (63), Bath
“It's so smooth and thick, great taste” Recruitment Consultant, Tom (29), Leeds
"As a busy mum, and being a vegan, this product is an excellent
supplement to my healthy diet and busy lifestyle, it tastes fantastic alone or
in smoothies!" Lawyer and Mum, Laura (31), Gatwick
"Amazing product, it even tastes great with water as everything is
natural!" Group Financial Controller, Richard (31), Brighton
“As a 60 year old female still training and competing in sport this is
the perfect product for me – it is 100% natural and it tastes great!!” Business owner and former Olympian, Diana (60), Shrewsbury



6th April – Indiegogo campaign completes
and all orders are collated


7th-30th April – All raw
materials are ordered and delivered to manufacturing facility 


1st May – eCommerce site goes live


May – All Indiegogo
orders are confirmed, flavours chosen, delivery addresses confirmed, delivery costs
paid (depending on final shipping location), products packaged and sent fresh
to your door step to enjoy


[NOTE: all dates in timeline are estimates and while
we will endeavour to hit these (if not exceed) they do not represent a
confirmed process!]
Delivery charges: all of our products will incur a
delivery charge to cover the cost of shipping, we promise to keep this as low
as possible! (we will ask for this in advance of sending your order). Note that
if delivering outside of the UK you are liable for any customs duty at import.Experience based perks with the Neat Nutrition team are based on purchaser travelling to London.  If other locations are desired we are more than happy to travel but travel costs will be added.
Flavours and product choices (when applicable) we
also be collected before delivery to ensure you get the product and flavour of
your choice!
Please email us for more detailed shipping estimates
for the product you wish to purchase (founders@neat-nutrition.com)

story:
All over the world the source has to depend heavily on the middle men to make their products and services reach the end customer. In this tricky process the middle men enjoy most of the financial benefits than the source and the end user.

To tackle this scenario we have ventured a people powered Free Online Classified portal. Infomagic is a free online classifieds platform, where people can connect with each other to buy or sell goods and services.

Infomagic.com, at present functioning as an online advertising and real estate portal is going to have a rebirth in a new platform with a new look and feel. We wish to be the largest free online classified website, a place where people can connect with each other absolutely free to buy or sell goods and services.


For this initially we are launching in Kerala also known as "god's own country", an easy platform for the 33 million Keralites to showcase their products or services to the rest of the world absolutely free of cost. Through this new platform, Infomagic also connects the people in the rest of the world to introduce their products and services to the 33 million customers in God’s own country.

Infomagic is aiming to simplify the trade, so that users can buy and sell in the most convenient and easiest way possible. We have 15 categories and more than 95 sub categories to make buy and sell as effortless and cost-effective as possible. 

Even though the advertisements are free, we reserve a small space in each page of infomagic as premium advertisement space. People can use this space to get more visibility for their advertisement at a minimal cost which will help this movement sustainable.

Why should You support us?

Infomagic will benefit the source and the end users in a big way which will in turn reduce the living cost and help people live a better life.

Monetary support is needed to rebuild and redesign infomagic.com with the latest technology.

Financial investment is needed to reach out and create awareness in people to make infomagic the largest free online classified portal.

While extending your support to a great cause you can also enjoy the warmth of God’s own country through our unique perks.


The Impact

We the team here in Infomagic find it our obligation to help the people to market their products and services locally as well as globally with ease and without any expense avoiding middlemen. At the same time we would like to introduce the latest opportunities of the world in front of our patrons.


The Perks

$ 10 USD

Dream supporter's

Be a part of the people powered free online classified portal. Every little amount helps us to reach our goal.Thank you for your amazing support. You will get a personalized Gift card from Team Infomagic. Your name will be displayed with gratitude in the 'Dream Supporter's page of infomagic.com

$ 30 USD

One month Premium Ad space at 30% OFF

You will get a one month premium Ad space coupon at 30% off, from team Infomagic. We will promote your product, business, or blog through the premium advertisement space in infomagic.com for one month.

 The validity of this coupon is one year from the date of issue and the  coupon is transferable too .

 You will also get a personalized Gift card from Team infomagic and your name  will be displayed with gratitude in the ‘Dream Supporter’s page’ of infomagic.com




$ 70 USD

One month Banner Ad space in Infomagic @ 30% OFF

You will get a one month Banner ad space coupon at 30% Off,  from Team Infomagic. We will promote your product, business, or blog through the Banner advertisement space in infomagic.com for one month. 

The validity of this coupon is one year from the date of issue and the  coupon is transferable too .

 You will also get a personalized Gift card from Team infomagic and your name  will be displayed with gratitude in the ‘Dream Supporter’s page’ of infomagic.com



$ 100 USD

God’s Own Spices and Handicrafts

A Combo offer with - One Month banner ad space , One Premium ad space and a gift pack with God’s Own Country Spices and Handicrafts

This perk is a beautiful gift pack containing God’s Own Country Kerala’s unique spices and exclusive handicrafts.

In the last millennium the greatest attraction of India was her invaluable spices. The spice trade between Kerala and much of the world was one of the main drivers of the world economy and ports in Kerala were the busiest (Muziris) among all trade and travel routes in the history of the world.


The Kerala handicraftsmen and artisans are considered to be one of the best in the whole world capturing the natural beauty of the surroundings in to wood, metal, horn, and clay.

Please add $25 for international shipping.


$ 240 USD

Take 3 Banner Adspace (transferable) in Infomagic and get an ISUN 3G Tablet worth $200 absolutely Free!!!

 


Business promotion team of Infomagic, in association with ISUN brings you one of the best 3G Tablet you can ever get at this price range. This spectacular device is a 7 inch Tablet with MTK dual core processor, IGB Ram, 8 GB internal memory + 32 GB SD card.  Isun tab comes with 5Mp back camera, 2Mp front camera and with HDMI port and 3G sim slot.

$ 1000 USD

God's own Ayurveda

You will get a Combo offer of 4 Banner ad space and 20 Premium ad space (transferable) in Infomagic with Gods Own Country Ayurveda Package of 7 Days

Ayurveda, the science of life and longevity is the oldest healthcare system in the world and it combines the profound thoughts of medicine and philosophy. This traditional medical practice native to the Indian subcontinent originated in prehistoric times (5000 BC).


Kerala possesses an unbroken tradition of Ayurveda and unlike the other Indian states the status of Ayurveda in Kerala is not alternative but mainstream. For hundreds of years the Ayurveda Vaidyas (traditional practitioners of Ayurveda in Kerala) were almost the only resort for people seeking healing from every kind of disease in Kerala.

In Kerala Ayurvedic Vaidyas pursue a holistic approach observe physical existence, mental existence, and personality as a single unit and regard each element capable of influencing the other. Ayurveda in Kerala offers a range of treatments and therapies including basic massages, Pizhichil, Njavarakizhi, Sirodhara, Vasthi, Sirovasthi, Udvarthanam, Abhyangam, Nasyam, Thalam etc.


Derived from the Sanskrit word yuj, Yoga means union of the individual consciousness or soul with the universal consciousness or Spirit thus unfolding the infinite potentials of the human body, mind, and soul. Practicing the art of Yoga enhances the overall wellbeing of an individual.


In simple words, a complete makeover for the body, mind, and soul is what Kerala Ayurvedic treatment is all about.

Those who contribute for 4 Banner ad space and  20 Premium ad space (transferable) in Infomagic can enjoy a 7 days free Ayurvedic treatment, Yoga course, stay, and food for one person at a renowned Kerala Ayurvedic centre associated with Infomagic.

We will send you a gift coupon along with the details of the Ayurvedic treatment and Yoga class. The coupon is valid for 24 months from the date of issue so that you will get enough time to plan your amazing trip to the God’s Own Country.

The gift coupon is transferrable that makes it an excellent present also for your near and dear ones.


$ 1250 USD

God's own country package tour for Two Persons

you will get a combo offer of 4Banner ad space and  20 Premium ad space (transferable) in Infomagic with God’s Own Country Package Tour of 7 Days for Two persons

Kerala, also known as God’s own country is the southernmost state of India. Wedged between the Western Ghats on the East and the Arabian Sea on the West, this narrow strip of land is a tourist destination of a lifetime. Such a small terrain can hold this much diverse geographical features and cultures is a wonder in itself and made it one of the most sought after tourist destination in Asia.


Kerala is named as one of the ten paradises of the world by the National Geographic Traveller for its timeless beauty of the palm fringed beaches of Kovalam and Varkala, the majesty of the undulating hills of Munnar and Vagamon, the serenity of the pristine backwaters of Kumarakom & Kuttanad and the enchanting woods and forests of Thekkady and Silent Valley.


Those who contribute for 4 Banner ad space and 20 Premium Ad space (transferable) in Infomagic  can enjoy  a 7 days “Experience Kerala travel package” for two persons on twin sharing basis. This package includes 2 / 3 star hotel or diamond category home stay accommodation with breakfast and all travel expense within Kerala.

We will send you a gift coupon along with the details of the travel package and the list of hotels or home stays associated with Infomagic. The coupon is valid for 24 months from the date of issue so that you will get enough time to plan your amazing trip to the God’s Own Country.

The gift coupon is transferable that makes it an excellent present also for your near and dear ones.



Time Line

February  to April 2015  - Design and development

May 2015  - Product testing

1st June  - Infomagic re-launch in new platform.


FAQ

Are the perks transferable?

Yes it is.

One of the beauties of the perks is that you can transfer the perks to your dear and near ones and can use it as a gift.

Just contact Infomagic team through mail at info@infomagic.com or  teaminfomagic@gmail.com for the transfer with the necessary details.

Can I increase the number of days included in God’s Own Country Ayurveda or Kerala Tour Packages?

Yes, you can.  But you have to pay the additional expenses as per the change.

Please contact Infomagic team through mail at info@infomagic.com or teaminfomagic@gmail.com for making your visit custom made. 

Are shipping costs included in the Perk price of God’s Own Country Spices & Handicrafts or Isun Tablet?

No, the price is excluding shipping costs.

Please first select the Perk you want to have and then add shipping as a $25 additional perk. 

For example, if you have selected the Isun Tablet Perk for $ 230 USD, please add $ 25 USD as an additional perk.

I forgot to add the shipping perk - what should I do?

Don’t worry. If you forgot to add shipping costs when purchasing God’s Own Country Spices & Handicrafts or Isun Tablet Perk, please just purchase the shipping perk now. Please remember to use the same Indiegogo account or email you used to contribute before

story:
What's Our Story? A great coffee lover once said, “To drink is human, to drink coffee is divine.” To Seth and Lauren, coffee is more than just a cup of coffee, it’s a story. This story opens with the farmers who grow the beans and culminates with the those who consume it. Lauren’s and Seth’ s passion for coffee and people is the root of their drive to opening Firebrand Coffee Company. 

We believe that we can use coffee excellence to transform the view of specialty coffee in Austin and beyond by presenting a holistic story of coffee and appealing to a hyper-social Austin community. These two goals will naturally occur by bridging community gaps between farmers and consumers and by donating 10% of all profits to local and global non-profit organizations. 

Additionally, we have taken practical steps over the past several years to make a dream this reality. Some of these steps include researching and networking with coffee connoisseurs and business owners, participating in Counter Culture Coffee Barista and Hand Brewing Certifications, roasting coffee for San Antonio’s Brown Coffee Company and working in specialty coffee shops.

                     


What Do We Need & Why Is It Important?

We love coffee, and we love that it is a global process! Since our coffee is global, shouldn’t its impact be global? 10% of all Firebrand profits will be directly donated every month toward building clean water wells in Africa and toward organizations devoted to ending human trafficking. Click the links below to see what you will be directly supporting!

                    

          The A21 Campaign                   Rahab's Rope                   The Water Project 

PS- Our first Water Project was just completed this past December in Uganda! Check it out here! 


In order to give to these organizations, we need $35,000 to open our doors and make things happen. Firebrand Coffee isn’t just about us. It’s about the local community in South Austin and the world beyond us.  Are you ready to be a part of something greater and impact the world through specialty coffee? Do you want your daily coffee ritual to explode into a global cause? Would you connect with us by giving to help us give? The chart below describes how the funds will be distributed. 



How Do We Know It Will Succeed? 

A cord of three stands is not quickly broken. That's why Firebrand Coffee Company is built on many skill sets, gifts, talents of a strong team of partners, and an undeniable calling. 

Many people have dreams to open their own coffee shop. However, great ideas are just that until put into action. That's why we had our extensive business plan reviewed by multiple business professionals with resounding approval and have continued to network within our community to make as strong of a team as possible. We have already partnered with successful entrepreneurs, businessmen, and influential local community members to ensure that this vision for South Austin is realistic and the dream is attainable. We have determined how to minimize our costs, maximize our services, and maintain a low overhead. 

If you would like to receive a copy of our business proposal, please email us at: lauren@firebrandcoffee.com     -or-      seth@firebrandcoffee.com 


                                 


Other Ways You Can Help

This venture is so much greater than individuals. It is a world wide community effort and we need you! Don't miss out on the opportunity!

Would you also consider praying for Firebrand Coffee and putting our word on the street? If you know others who want to get in on this vision, pass our page along!

Be sure to like our Facebook and follow us on Instagram and Twitter! Check out our blogs and re-post our video!
story_txt:
What's Our Story? A great coffee lover once said, “To drink is human, to drink coffee is divine.” To Seth and Lauren, coffee is more than just a cup of coffee, it’s a story. This story opens with the farmers who grow the beans and culminates with the those who consume it. Lauren’s and Seth’ s passion for coffee and people is the root of their drive to opening Firebrand Coffee Company. 


We believe that we can use coffee excellence to transform the view of specialty coffee in Austin and beyond by presenting a holistic story of coffee and appealing to a hyper-social Austin community. These two goals will naturally occur by bridging community gaps between farmers and consumers and by donating 10% of all profits to local and global non-profit organizations. 


Additionally, we have taken practical steps over the past several years to make a dream this reality. Some of these steps include researching and networking with coffee connoisseurs and business owners, participating in Counter Culture Coffee Barista and Hand Brewing Certifications, roasting coffee for San Antonio’s Brown Coffee Company and working in specialty coffee shops.


                     




What Do We Need & Why Is It Important? 
We love coffee, and we love that it is a global process! Since our coffee is global, shouldn’t its impact be global? 10% of all Firebrand profits will be directly donated every month toward building clean water wells in Africa and toward organizations devoted to ending human trafficking. Click the links below to see what you will be directly supporting!
                    

          The A21 Campaign                   Rahab's Rope                   The Water Project 



PS- Our first Water Project was just completed this past December in Uganda! Check it out here! 





In order to give to these organizations, we need $35,000 to open our doors and make things happen. Firebrand Coffee isn’t just about us. It’s about the local community in South Austin and the world beyond us.  Are you ready to be a part of something greater and impact the world through specialty coffee? Do you want your daily coffee ritual to explode into a global cause? Would you connect with us by giving to help us give? The chart below describes how the funds will be distributed. 







How Do We Know It Will Succeed? 

A cord of three stands is not quickly broken. That's why Firebrand Coffee Company is built on many skill sets, gifts, talents of a strong team of partners, and an undeniable calling. 

Many people have dreams to open their own coffee shop. However, great ideas are just that until put into action. That's why we had our extensive business plan reviewed by multiple business professionals with resounding approval and have continued to network within our community to make as strong of a team as possible. We have already partnered with successful entrepreneurs, businessmen, and influential local community members to ensure that this vision for South Austin is realistic and the dream is attainable. We have determined how to minimize our costs, maximize our services, and maintain a low overhead. 
If you would like to receive a copy of our business proposal, please email us at: lauren@firebrandcoffee.com     -or-      seth@firebrandcoffee.com 



                                  


Other Ways You Can Help This venture is so much greater than individuals. It is a world wide community effort and we need you! Don't miss out on the opportunity!
Would you also consider praying for Firebrand Coffee and putting our word on the street? If you know others who want to get in on this vision, pass our page along!
Be sure to like our Facebook and follow us on Instagram and Twitter! Check out our blogs and re-post our video!

story:
About this project

The HootBox is a subscription box aimed at providing college students with all of the essentials needed to make it through the semester. Sent monthly, our boxes are designed to:

• Pique curiosity - By exposing students to new and exciting brands they may have never heard of, worn, or tasted.

• Inspire adventure - By connecting students to fun and exciting local businesses and hotspots close to their campus.

• Encourage resourcefulness - By also providing some practical items of everyday use in a students life; such as Scantrons, laundry detergent, and much more.

Parents, there is no better way to show your student your love, than by actually "giving a Hoot!"


At The HootBox, we show that we give a Hoot by partnering with organization's such as World Vision to help build schools in developing nations.

We also desire to better the community in our own backyard, by engaging in career/life mentoring, creating scholarship opportunities, and simply loving on underprivileged youth.

Rewards

Thank you SO MUCH for helping us launch! $1000 is the bare minimum we need, but we know that we can DOUBLE or even TRIPPLE this goal - maybe $10,000?!  As a small token of our appreciation, we want to give you a gift :) 


Our CEO: Henrik Hoot 


Risks and challenges

One of the primary reasons we are running this campaign is to help raise the working capital needed to, invest in infrastructure, create new distribution channels, and establish inventory.

Once we reach our goal and these things are in place, we will be able to create the first HootBoxes, and get them shipped out to you =)

While we have spent many hours on developing the product and the process in which we fill each box, we understand the risks and challenges that are associated with a subscription product. Suppliers change on a regular basis and we will work months ahead to make sure we have your HootBox ready in advance. With any subscription product, understand the need to sustain a breadth of subscribers to stay operational, but we also understand the importance of depth in our customer relations, to maintain and add exponential value to those who use our service. We plan to achieve this through the success of this campaign and our online marketing strategy.

story:
Hello everyone,

Thank you all so much! Our campaign has finally come to a close. While we didn't quite reach our initial goal, all your kind contributions will still go a long way helping those in need. Every bit makes a difference!

Indiegogo will take some time (up to 15 days, per their policy) to reimburse the money. We will then proceed to transfer everything to the 3 respective organizations ASAP. We'll be sure to update you again (in 2-3 weeks) with official receipts (and possibly photos) at the end.

Now our team is already working on distributing the perks! The ETA for physical cards/photographs/notes is set for September. We hope the digital perks (including Steam keys where applicable) to reach you sooner, perhaps as soon as the organizations have a chance to stamp the printed donor list with their stamps/seals.

Again, big thanks to everyone who helped in any way. You guys have been truly amazing!
------------------------
P.S.: Although this particular campaign is over, there are still other ways to give. We've learned that Facebook has since partnered up with the non-profit "Save the Children" foundation to enable convenient donations for Myanmar(Burma) flood victims. In addition, the former has also pledged to match donations for up to 500,000 USD total, making it a great way to give. Please check it out @ facebook.com/myanmarfloodrelief and please pass on the word!


What's Happening?

A flood can take away so much from their victims. People in affected areas typically lose everything. Homes, farms and gardens, crops, food, supplies and most personal belongings are all lost. It's a major setback that puts the very livelihoods at stake. Things are very difficult on their own. Please help them out during this intense struggle.

Image: Kawlin, Sagaing Division

Image: Pwint Phyu, Magway Division


Pyay, Bago Divison

With your help, they will have a much better chance at surviving this ordeal. Please lend them a hand, so they can be resilient, live through this, and eventually get back on their feet.

Individually, we each can only do so much. But collectively, we can certainly make a huge difference, even the difference between life and death in many cases.


Image: Pwint Phyu, Magway Division


Image: Kalay, Sagaing Division


Image: Kachin State


Every little bit counts! We promise to strive, to the best of our ability, to ensure that EVERY SINGLE CENT RECEIVED will go towards relief efforts and rehabilitation.

And on everyone's behalf, we would like to express our heartfelt appreciations for your kindness and generosity. When we always try to help those in need, we also assure to ourselves that humanity will always be cared for.

Image: MinPya, Rakhine State


Image: Hakha, Chin State


What We Need & What You Get

We have a "zero overhead" promise. Except for the transaction fees charged by IndieGogo, Paypal and Credit Card services, we are not touching any amount of the money collected.  All the costs associated with the perks (except shipping fees) such as free translations, free Steam game keys, photos & postcards will be provided for, and handled by our volunteer team members. We are a dedicated group of 19 people.

Given the widespread severity of the situation, we are hoping to raise 22,800 USD or more. The more we can raise, the better it is for the victims!

This campaign itself will be running for 10 days and it will be 15 more days until IndieGogo reimburses. We hope that the emergency rescue phase would be over by then, but equally serious problems would still persist, including access to clean potable water, and treatment/control of post-flood diseases such as cholera.

Therefore, most of the funds received would be going towards rehabilitation, which is always a big part of work in the aftermath of such unexpected disasters. Thus, all fundin received will go for after-disaster aids such as source of clean water, medicine and other necessities that flood victims require.

We are just acting as medium to raise funds so those without direct contact with local organizations there can still give. We are not going to manage the funds ourselves but all the money will go to three established and reputable organizations mentioned below.

The Impact

The main goal of this funding project is to facilitate international donations. We promise to transfer every last cent to reputable non-government & non-profit volunteer networks operating in flood relief and recovery. We will distribute the money evenly between three different organizations, namely:

1. Daw Khin Kyi Foundation (overseen by "The Lady" herself, namesake charity foundation for the late mother of Burmese Nobel Laureate Daw Aung San Suu Kyi), They are helping extensively to feed the affected areas by sending rice, drinking water, and kitchen utensils throughout the region.
Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/DKKfoundation
Website : http://dawkhinkyifoundation.org

2. Free Funeral/Burial Service Society (one of Burma's largest and foremost volunteer societies, established by the late Film Director U Thukha, and one of the most effective/efficient philanthropic organizations operating in Burma today).
FFSS is sending dried foods, rice, and medicine for several affected areas. Their members are going out to affected areas for emergency aid efforts as well.
Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/FFSS.YGN
Website : http://ffssyangon.org/

3. Online Volunteers of Disaster Recovery for Myanmar (aka OVDR4MM, an active network of online volunteers from all throughout Burma).
OVDR4MM is not only providing urgent needs such as food and medicine, but also aiding with rehab works including cleaning of blocked wells, providing clean water source, and distributing mosquito nets.
Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/OVDR4MM

Please be informed that we have discussed with above all three organisations about this campaign and we have got their permission to proceed.


Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for taking the time to read!

Have you already donated elsewhere? Or for any reason can't directly donate at the moment? Fret not, please spread a few words about this project to your community, your social media network, or to your colleagues who might be interested. Literally every penny counts and so does every share!


Disclaimer : This disaster is overwhelming and we couldn't find source of photos as those are widespread on Facebook. We hope that rightful owners would understand the use without having first obtained permission, as this is for good cause. We really appreciate their effort to inform the news via the photos they took. Should the owner wish us to remove their photo(s), kindly contact chanmyaekhine@gmail.com and we'll remove it right away.

story:
My name is Gaëlle and I am a native French speaker. After I received my Ph.D. six years ago in molecular biology and plant physiology, I moved to East Lansing to work at Michigan State University. I met my husband here, and we had our first child last year.

When I took time off from working full-time in the laboratory to devote to my son’s early development,  I began taking him to different mother-and-baby groups in the area. I only speak in French to him because I want him to be bilingual and multicultural. To my surprise, other parents who heard me speaking French to him began to ask if I could tutor their children as well. This was the birth of the idea to start a French language immersion class for babies.

I buried myself in research reports about the benefits of immersion learning and studied effective teaching strategies, and in April 2015 I launched my new venture out of two temporary spaces that I rented by the hour. I called it Aux Petits Soins (oh puh-TEE swah), a French idiom that means “to take tender care of."


                                 


The program was successful from the beginning. For my first session in the spring, I started with children between the ages of 6 months and 4 years. Due to high demand, in the summer session I added classes for kids up to age 6, and for the fall session, which started last month, I added even more classes, accommodating kids up to age 9. I already have a waiting list for kids up to age 12 for next year.

In parallel, parents and other people who heard about Aux Petits Soins began to ask me if there was an adult equivalent of these classes. I didn’t feel qualified to teach adults — children are like sponges when it comes to learning, adults not so much — but it gave me the idea to create a space where people of all ages could meet and speak to each other in French if they already know the language ... or just sit and appreciate it if they don’t. French cooking classes, movie nights, painting lessons: the possibilities are endless.

But with the rapid increase in the number of classes I was teaching — not to mention the addition of this new concept of an all-ages cultural center — I realized that the space I was renting would not be enough.

I thought it would take longer to get to this level, but I wanted to keep this momentum going. So last month I secured a location in Lansing’s growing Eastside Neighborhood. There’s just one catch: I don’t have the funds to furnish it yet. Until this point, I’ve re-invested almost every dollar that’s come in back into the business. I’ve been able to buy new instructional toys, books, materials and some light furnishings. My goals for Aux Petits Soins (the library, the café) were initially more long range, but securing this permanent space has kicked everything into overdrive. I now need to transform an empty space into a teaching and cultural center.

That’s where you come in.


        

           café + play area                              classroom                                       library

Our new home will have a classroom, an all-ages library, a play area for children, and a café. To furnish Aux Petits Soins’ new home and keep creating events in the community, my goal is to raise $15,000. That money will go toward office furniture, window coverings, wall hangings, bookshelves, classroom supplies, books and magazines, educational toys, a baby changing area, and comfortable café furniture with nice lighting that will be perfect for skimming through a French magazine or enjoying a latte.

Some of the items — mostly the books, magazines and educational materials — will be imported from France, but I intend to utilize reclaimed and gently used local furniture when possible. Creating an authentic and welcoming French environment is turning out to be more expensive then I had hoped. However, when you see the space I've envisioned where you can be immersed in the French culture, like a little Paris in Lansing, I'm sure you'll agree it was worth every penny."

Any donation will help. That’s why I opted for a flexible fund. If we exceed our goal, funds will be used to market Aux Petits Soins, including the creation of a website and advertisement. Marketing is going to be critical because there's no other business like this in the area.


Aux Petits Soins is more than just a place where you can learn to speak French. With the opening of Aux Petits Soins, we will be able to offer a place for the French community to gather.

Our programs create a rare opportunity to learn French in an immersive environment and to be in touch with the French culture. To my knowledge, this will be the first business of its kind in Michigan. I hope Aux Petits Soins will be the center of French culture, uniting other local businesses and programs that have French themes, including Le Bon Macaron, a French bakery in East Lansing; Le Chat Gourmet, a culinary class in Eaton Rapids; and the French clubs at Michigan State University and the East Lansing Public Library. Of course, students and community members of all ages who appreciate French culture will be welcome to speak in French and enjoy the company of other francophiles.

Whatever amount you decide to give, this is already a huge contribution to this project, so "merci beaucoup" for helping out. I can't thank you enough.

And because this is such a unique project, I wanted to create some unique perks that would be true to the spirit of Aux Petits Soins. I collaborated with a few local artists to design awesome stuff. Here, check it out:

Magnetic bumper sticker  and mug (pics of T-shirts coming soon!):

                                   

                        BS#1                                               BS#2                                      M#1

Don't worry, the color of the mug will match pefectly the color of our logo!


The obvious risk would be not connecting with the Michigan community who would enjoy everything Aux Petits Soins has to offer. This is a very niche market, and attracting their attention will be very difficult.

But I know the demand is here, as evidenced by our steady growth — it’s just been challenging connecting with parents who want their children to be bilingual. Will there be enough demand to sustain a full-time French language immersion school and cultural center? I’m betting yes. I believe it will become a cultural destination.

Already, I have parents from Grand Rapids, Twin Lake and Midland who drive up to two hours each week to bring their children to class. However, I know better than to take this success for granted. By being more visible, I’m sure we can continue to grow our French community.

The growth of Aux Petits Soins has been possible thanks to positive word-of-mouth, so I owe another big “merci beaucoup” to all the families who have helped me get my vision off the ground.

If you would love to help, but cannot give financially, consider sharing our story by email or through social media:

  • Follow us on Twitter (@APSFrenchClass)
  • Like us on Facebook (auxpetitssoinsllc). I  frequently post articles or stories I find that have to do with French culture, the benefits of foreign language immersion, and other things I find interesting.

Additionally, if you have any French books, wall hangings or knickknacks that you’d be willing donate, that would really help me achieve the look I’m going for. Bookshelves, mirrors, and A/V equipment would also be welcome.

Creating an authentic and welcoming French environment is turning out to be more expensive then I had hoped. However, when you see the space I've envisioned where you can be immersed in the French culture, like a little Paris in Lansing, I'm sure you'll agree it was worth every penny." Any donation will help. That’s why I opted for a flexible fund. If we exceed our goal, funds will be used to market Aux Petits Soins, including the creation of a website and advertisement. Marketing is going to be critical because there's no other business like this in the area. Aux Petits Soins is more than just a place where you can learn to speak French. With the opening of Aux Petits Soins, we will be able to offer a place for the French community to gather.Our programs create a rare opportunity to learn French in an immersive environment and to be in touch with the French culture. To my knowledge, this will be the first business of its kind in Michigan. I hope Aux Petits Soins will be the center of French culture, uniting other local businesses and programs that have French themes, including Le Bon Macaron, a French bakery in East Lansing; Le Chat Gourmet, a culinary class in Eaton Rapids; and the French clubs at Michigan State University and the East Lansing Public Library. Of course, students and community members of all ages who appreciate French culture will be welcome to speak in French and enjoy the company of other francophiles. Whatever amount you decide to give, this is already a huge contribution 
to this project, so "merci beaucoup" for helping out. I can't thank you enough. And because this is such a unique project, I wanted to create some unique perks that would be true to the spirit of Aux Petits Soins. I collaborated with a few local artists to design awesome stuff. Here, check it out:Magnetic bumper sticker  and mug (pics of T-shirts coming soon!):                                                             BS#1                                               BS#2                                      M#1Don't worry, the color of the mug will match pefectly the color of our logo! The obvious risk would be not connecting with the Michigan community who would enjoy everything Aux Petits Soins has to offer. This is a very niche market, and attracting their attention will be very difficult. But I know the demand is here, as evidenced by our steady growth — it’s just been challenging connecting with parents who want their children to be bilingual. Will there be enough demand to sustain a full-time French language immersion school and cultural center? I’m betting yes. I believe it will become a cultural destination. Already, I have parents from Grand Rapids, Twin Lake and Midland who drive up to two hours each week to bring their children to class. However, I know better than to take this success for granted. By being more visible, I’m sure we can continue to grow our French community. The growth of Aux Petits Soins has been possible thanks to positive word-of-mouth, so I owe another big “merci beaucoup” to all the families who have helped me get my vision off the ground. If you would love to help, but cannot give financially, consider sharing our story by email or through social media:
Follow us on Twitter (@APSFrenchClass)

Like us on Facebook (auxpetitssoinsllc). I  frequently post articles or stories I find that have to do with French culture, the benefits of foreign language immersion, and other things I find interesting. 
Additionally, if you have any French books, wall hangings or knickknacks that you’d be willing donate, that would really help me achieve the look I’m going for. Bookshelves, mirrors, and A/V equipment would also be welcome.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Topaco Stephen and I hail from Amuru District, Northern Uganda. I started school in 1997 when the insurgency in the country was at its peak. Despite the countless challenges, I managed to come through it.

I graduated from college in 2013 with a degree in Public Administration and management from Gulu University, with a specific interest in project planning and management. In the years since then, I organized  with some of my lifelong friends to form a youth-led community group that has a vision for an economically empowered community that is able to meet the basic livelihoods requirements for all of its members.

Our group is called Hope for the Future Community Empowerment Group and we have written a project Titled "Future Hope Community Empowerment Piggery Project."

We intend to empower the vulnerable community in our village through a piggery project. The major target groups for this venture are unemployed youths out of school, Child-headed households, Child mothers, and vulnerable women. We plan to provide them with hands-on training skills in piggery management and then engage them in groups to start a small pig rearing sub-project. Once they raise these pigs, they will be self-supportive and,  in the long run,  able to support other established groups in the community by donating pigs to them to rear in their groups. We envisage that this support will keep expanding to groups in the villages and parishes and, ultimately, that it will roll out to groups in the entire sub-county. We also intend to train these groups in small enterprise management so that they are equipped with the skills to establish and manage micro enterprises, an investment which we believe will enable them to further improve upon their livelihoods and economic well being.

This project will have a great impact on the socioeconomic well-being of the community and should also enable them to meet the basic requirements for maintaining their livelihood. When the pigs multiply, the community groups will be able to sell some of them in order to afford the basic necessities for their families, send their children to school, and afford better medical services. Many of the people in these groups experience a poor standard of living and are faced with the inability to meet their most basic economic needs. This project will provide the resources and space for vulnerable members of the community to work together to mitigate the challenges they face, such as extreme poverty. Since they will have an alternative means of livelihood, they will no longer be exclusively dependent on subsistence crop gardening, which is prevalent in the community today. Beneficiaries of this project will be expected to improve their economic status, and consequently they will be able to live better lives. We envision that the project will also help to promote a spirit of unity and togetherness among these vulnerable groups. 

We are requesting for funding support of USD 10,000 to help us establish and run this piggery project. The requested funds would help us to meet the costs of constructing a pig pen, hiring veterinary services, purchasing pig feed and training materials, and administrative support.

We expect to encounter some risks and challenges in our project endeavor. One of the assumed risks is that we may not be able to achieve our funding goal and this would, unfortunately, affect the implementation of our project activities. If this happens, we plan to adjust our budget to fit within the available funding that we receive. There is also the possibility that we will be able to make personal contributions to strengthen our financial capacity in running this endeavor.
We expect to sustain our project through support from the project team and willingness of the community to participate in its implementation. We expect our project to benefit over 300 vulnerable women and youths out of school within a time frame of 2 years.

 

Help us share our campaign in your networks on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media networking platforms to enable us reach out to the rest of the world for support towards our project.
